manzils.text: Yi lie ban zhe fashi
yi quce zhe fashi
yi songdu jiaohui zhe fashi
nimen suo dang chongbai de, que shi du yi de
ta shi tiandi wanwu zhi zhu, shi yiqie dongfang de zhu
Wo que yi yong wencai ji fanxing dianzhui zuijin de tian
wo dui yiqie panni de emo baohu ta
tamen bude qieting shang jie de zhong tianshi, tamen zi ge fang bei sheji
bei quzhu, tamen jiang shou yongjiu de xingfa
Dan qieting yici de, canlan de liuxing jiu zhuigan shang ta
Ni wen tamen ba! Jiujing shi tamen geng nan zao ne? Haishi wo suo chuangzao de geng nan zao ne? Wo que yi yong zhan ni chuangzaole tamen
buran! Ni gandao jingqi, er tamen que chaoxiao
Tamen sui wen jiaohui, que bu juewu
Tamen sui jian jixiang, que jiayi chaoxiao
tamen shuo:“Zhege zhishi mingxian de moshu
Nandao women si hou, yi bian wei chentu he xiu gu de shihou, biding fuhuo ma
Lian women de zuxian, ye yao fuhuo ma?”
Ni shuo:“Shi de! Nimen dou yao beijian di bei fuhuo.”
Cai tingjian yisheng nahan, tamen jiu zhanwangzhe
tamen shuo:“Shang zai women! Zhe jiushi baoying zhi ri.”
Zhe jiushi nimen suo fouren de panjue zhi ri
Nimen yingdang jihe bu yi zhe he tamen de banlu, yiji tamen she an la er chongbai de
ranhou zhishi tamen huo yu de daolu
bing lanzhu tamen, yinwei tamen dique yao shoushen wen
Nimen zenme bu huzhu ne
Buran! Tamen zai jinri shi guishun de
Yushi tamen dajia zouxiang qian lai, huxiang tanlun
zhexie ren shuo:“Nimen que yi yong quanli xiepo women.”
Naxie ren shuo:“Buran! Nimen ziji yuanlai bu shi xindao zhe
women dui nimen jue wu quanli. Buran! Nimen shi beini de minzhong
Gu women yingdang shou women de zhu de panjue, women que shi changshi de
Suo yi women shi nimen mi wu, women ziji ye queshi shi mi wu de.”
Zai na ri, tamen biding tong shou xingfa
Wo biding zheyang duidai fanzui zhe
Tamen que shi zheyang de: Youren dui tamen shuo:“Chu an la wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de,” tamen jiu wang zizun da
bingqie shuo:“Nandao women wubi yao wei yige kuangwang de shiren, er paoqi women de zhong shenling ma?”
Buran! Ta zhaoshile zhenli, bing zhengshile lidai de shizhe
Nimen biding changshi tongku de xingfa
nimen zhi yi ziji de xingwei er shou baochou
Wei an la de qiancheng de zhong pu
jiang xiangshou yi zhong kezhi de jiyang——
ge zhong shuiguo, tongshi tamen shi shou youdai de
tamen zai enze de leyuan zhong
tamen zuo zai chuangshang, bici xiangdui
youren yi beizi zai tamen zhi jian ai ci chuandi, bei zhong man sheng liquan
yanse jiebai, yin zhe wubu cheng wei meiwei
liquan zhong wu mazui wu, tamen ye bu yin ta er mingding
tamen jiang you bushi feili de, mei mudi banlu
tamen fangfu bei zhencang de tuo luan yang
yushi tamen zouxiang qian lai, huxiang tanlun
Tamen zhong youyigeren shuo:“Wo you yi ge pengyou
ta wen wo:‘Ni que shi chengxin de ma
Nandao women si hou, yi bian wei chentu he xiu gu de shihou, hai biding yao shou baochou ma?’”
Ta shuo:“Nimen yuan kan ta ma?”
Ta fushi xiamian, jiu kanjian ta zai huo yu de zhongyang
ta shuo:“Yi an la fashi, ni dique jihu xianhaile wo
Ruguo meiyou wo de zhu de enhui, wo bi zai bei jujin zhe zhi lie
Women bushi zai si de ma
Wei you women chuci de siwang, er women jue bu hui shou chengfa ma
Zhe que shi weida de chenggong
gongzuo zhe yingdang wei huode zheyang de chenggong er gongzuo.”
Na shi geng shan de kuandai ne? Haishi zan hu shu
Wo yi ta wei bu yi zhe de zhemo
Ta shi zai huo yu di shengzhang de yi ke shu
ta de hua bi, fangfu mo tou
Tamen biding yao chi naxie guoshi, er yi ta chongshi du fu
Ranhou tamen biding yao zai naxie guoshi shang jia yin feishui de hun tang
ranhou tamen biding guiyu huo yu
Tamen biding hui faxian tamen de zuxian shi mi wu de
Tamen que yizhe tamen de zongji er benchi
Zai tamen zhiqian, daban de guren que yi mi wule
Wo zai tamen zhi jian, que yi paiqianguo xuduo jinggao zhe
Ni kan! Bei jinggao zhe de jieju shi zenyang de
Chufei an la de chunjie de purenmen
Nu ha que yi xiang wo qidao, wo shi zui shanyu yingda de
Wo zhengjiu ta he ta de xintumen taoli da nan
Wo zhi shi ta de zisun deyi shengcun
Wo shi ta de ling ming, yongcun yu houdai
Zai ge minzu zhong, dou youren shuo:“Zhu nu ha ping'an!”
Wo biding yao zheyang baochou xingshan zhemen
Ta que shi wo de xindao de puren
Ranhou, wo shi bie de ren yan si
Ta de zongpai zhong, que you yi bo la xin
Dangshi, ta daizhe jianquan de xinling, lai jian ta de zhu
Dangshi, ta dui ta de fuqin he zongzu shuo:“Nimen chongbai shenme
Nandao nimen yu she an la er beimiu de chongbai xuduo shenling ma
Nimen dui zhong shijie de zhu, jiujing zuo shenme caice?”
Ta kan yi kan xingsu
ranhou shuo:“Wo shibi yaohai bing.”
Tamen jiu beilile ta
ta jiu qiaoqiao de zouxiang tamen de zhong shenling, ta shuo:“Nimen zenme bu chi dongxi ne
Nimen zenme bu shuohua ne?”
Ta jiu qiaoqiao de yi youshou daji tamen
Zhongren jiu ji ji mang mang de lai kan ta
ta shuo:“Nimen chongbai ziji suo diaoke de ouxiang ma
An la chuangzao nimen, he nimen de xingwei.”
Tamen shuo:“Nimen yingdang wei ta er xiu yige huolu, ranhou jiang ta tou zai liehuo zhong.”
Tamen yu mouhai ta, er wo que shi tamen bian cheng zhan xiafeng de
Ta shuo:“Wo guoran yao qianyi dao wo de zhu suo qishi wo di difang qu, ta jiang zhidao wo
Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shangci wo yige shanliang de erzi.”
Wo jiu yi yige kuanhou de ertong xiang ta baoxi

Dang ta zhang dao neng bangzhe ta caozuo de shihou, ta shuo:“Wo de xiaozi a! Wo que yi meng jian wo zai ni wei xisheng. Ni kaolu yixia! Ni jiujing you she me yijian?” Ta shuo:“Wo de fuqin a! Qing ni zhixing ni suo feng de mingling ba! Ruguo an la yiyu, ni jiang faxian wo shi jianren de.”
Ta lia ji yi shunfu an la, er ta shi ta de erzi ce wozhe
Wo hanjiao shuo:“Yi bo la xin a
Ni que yi zhengshi nage mengle.” Wo biding yao zheyang baochou xingshan de renmen
Zhe que shi mingxian de kaoyan
Wo yi yige weida de xisheng shule ta
Wo shi ta de ling ming, yongcun yu houdai
“Zhu yi bo la xin ping'an!”
Wo zheyang baochou xingshan zhe
Ta que shi wo de xindao de puren
wo yi jiang wei xianzhi he qinglian zhe de yi si ha ge xiang ta baoxi
Wo jiang fu yu ta he yi si ha ge. Ta lia de zisun zhong, jiang you xingshan zhe he gongran zibaoziqi zhe
Wo que yi shi en yu mu sa he ha lun
Wo ceng shi ta lia ji qi zongzu, de mian yu da nan
Wo ceng yuanzhu tamen, suoyi tamen shi shengli zhe
Wo shouyu ta lia xiangming de jingdian
wo zhiyin ta lia zhengzhi de daolu
wo shi ta lia de ling ming, yongcun yu houdai
“Zhu mu sa he ha lun ping'an!”
Wo biding yao zheyang baochou xingshan zhe
Ta lia que shi wo de xindao de puren
Yi lei ya si que shi shizhe
Dangshi, ta dui ta de zongzu shuo:“Nandao nimen bu jingwei an la ma
Nandao nimen qidao bai er li, er she zui youyue de chuangzao zhe——
an la, nimen de zhu, nimen zuxian de zhu ma?”
Tamen fouren ta, suoyi tamen biding yao bei jujin
Wei an la de chunjie de zhong pu ze buran
Wo shi ta de ling ming, yongcun houdai
“Zhu yi lei ya si ping'an!”
Wo biding yao zheyang baochou xingshan zhe
Ta que shi wo de xindao de pu ren
Lu te que shi shizhe
Dangshi, wo zhengjiule ta, he ta de quanti xintu
weiyou yige lao fu ren he qiyu de ren, meiyou huode zhengjiu
Ranhou, wo huimiele bie de xuduo ren
Nimen dique zhaoxi jingguo tamen de yiji
nandao nimen bu liaojie ma
You nu si que shi shizhe
Dangshi, ta tao dao na zhi manzai de chuanbo shang
Ta jiu nianjiu, ta que shi shibai de
da yu jiu tunle ta, tongshi, ta shi ying shou qianze de
Jiaruo ta bushi chang zansong an la zhe
ta bi zangshen yu fu, zhidao shiren fuhuo zhi ri
Ranhou, wo jiang ta pao zai handi shang, dangshi ta shi you bing de
Wo shi yi ke hu gua, zhang qilai zhezhe ta
Wo ceng paiqian ta qu jiaohua shi duo wan minzhong
Tamen bian gui xin ta, wo shi tamen xiangle zhi yige dingqi
Ni wen tamen ba! Ni de zhu you xuduo nu'er, tamen que you duo shao erzi ni
Haishi wo ceng jiang zhong tianshi zaocheng nuxing de, tamen ceng yanjian wo de chuangzao ne
Zhen de, tamen yinwei ziji de beimiu, biding yao shuo
“An la yi shengyule.” Tamen que shi shuohuang zhe
Nandao ta buyao erzi, que yao nu'er ma
Nimen you she me liyou? Nimen zenme zheyang panduan ne
Nimen hai bu juewu ma
Nandao nimen you yige mingzheng ma
Na chu nimen de jingdian lai ba, tangruo nimen shi chengshi de ren
Tamen wangyan ta yu jingling zhi jian, youyinqin guanxi. Jingling que yi zhidao tamen jiang bei jujin
——chaojue zai an la! Ta shi chao hu tamen de xushu de
wei an la de qiancheng de zhong pu
nimen he nimen suo chongbai de
jue buneng ba renhe ren yinyou qu chongbai tamen
chufei shi jiang ru huo yu de ren
(Zhong tianshi shuo):“Women ren ren dou you yige zhiding di diwei
women biding shi pai ban de
women biding shi zansong an la de.”
Tamen dique chang shuo
“Jiaruo women you guren suo yiliu de jiaohui
name, women bi shi an la de chunjie de puren.”
Tamen que buxin an la, tamen bujiu jiu zhidaole
Wo dui wo suo paiqian de purenmen yi yue yan zai xianle
tamen biding shi bei yuanzhu de
wo de jundui, biding shi shengli de
Ni zhanshi tuibi tamen ba
Ni kanzhe ba! Tamen bujiu jiu kanjianle
Nandao tamen yaoqiu wo de xingfa zaori shixian ma
Wo de xingfa yidan jiang yu tamen de tingyuan de shihou, bei jinggao zhe de zaochen, zhen elie ya
Ni zhanshi tuibi tamen ba
Ni kanzhe ba! Tamen bujiu jiu kanjianle
Chaojue zai ni de zhu——zun rong de zhuzai! Ta shi chao hu tamen de xushu de
Zhu zhong shizhe ping'an
Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la——yangyu zhong shijie de zhu
Sa de. Zhi zhuming de “gulanjing” fashi
Buran! Bu xindao zhe, shi wang zizun da, weibei zhenli de
Zai tamen zhiqian wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, tamen huhao, dan taowang de shiji yi shiqule
Tamen jingya, yinwei tamen ben zu zhong de jinggao zhe lailin tamen. Bu xindao de renmen shuo:“Zhe shi yige shushi, shi yige shuohuang zhe
Nandao ta yao jiang xuduo shenling bian cheng yige shenling ma? Zhe que shi yi jian guaishi.”
Tamen zhong de guizumen qishen shuo:“Nimen qu ba! Nimen jianrenzhe chongbai nimen de zhong shenling ba! Zhe que shi yi jian qian ding de shi
Zai zuihou de zongjiao zhong, women meiyou tingjian zhe zhong hua, zhe zhong hua zhishi weizao de
Nandao jiaohui jiang yu ta, er bu jiang yu women ma?” Buran! Tamen duiyu wo de jiaoxun, shi zai huaiyi zhi zhong, buran! Tamen hai meiyou changshi wo de xingfa
Nandao tamen you ni wanneng de, bo shi de zhu de ci'en de kucang ma
Nandao tamen you tiandi wanwu de zhuquan ma? Jiaruo tamen you, jiu jiao tamen yuan tianti er shang ba
Tamen shi you ge dangpai lianhe qilai de wuhezhizhong, tamen jiangyao zai nali baibei
Zai tamen zhiqian, ceng fouren shizhe de, you nu ha de zongzu, a de ren, you wuli de falao
sai mo de ren, lu te de zongzu, mao lin de jumin. Zhexie dou shi dangpai
tamen zhi zhong meiyou yige weiceng fouren shizhe de, suoyi wo de chengfa shi biran de
Zhexie ren, zhi dengdai yisheng hanjiao, na shi bu dange yi shashi de
Tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Zai qingsuan ri zhiqian, qing ni kuai jiang women suo ying de de xingfa, jiang shi women ba!”
Ni dang renshou tamen suo shuo dehua, ni dang jiyi wo de pu ren——you nengli de da wu de, ta que shi guiyi an la de
Wo que yi shi zhu shan fucong ta, tamen zaowan zansong
Bing shi zhong niao jihe qilai, tongtong dou fucong ta
Wo gonggu ta de guo quan, wo shangci ta zhihui he wenci
Liang zao lai gaozhuang de gushi lailin nile ma? Dangshi, tamen yu qiang er jinru nei dian

Dangshi, tamen qu jian da wu de, ta wei tamen er kongbu. Tamen shuo:“Ni buyao kongbu! Women shi liang zao, beigao ceng qifule yuangao, qing ni wei women binggong caipan, qing ni buyao piantan, qing ni zhiyin women daolu
Zhege que shi wo de pengyou, ta you jiushijiu zhi mu mianyang, wo you yi zhi mu mianyang, ta queshuo:‘Ni ba ta rang gei wo ba!’ Ta zai bianlun fangmian zhansheng wo.”

Da wu de shuo:“Ta que yi qifu nile, yinwei ta yaoqiu ni ba ni de mu mianyang guibing ta de mu mianyang. You xuduo huoji, dique xiang qi, wei xindao er xingshan zhe ze buran, dan tamen shi hen shao de.” Da wu de yiwei wo kaoyan ta, ta jiu xiang ta de zhu qiurao, qie baidao xiaqu, bing guiyi ta
Wo jiu raole ta de guoshi, ta zai wo nali, dique huode chong'ai he youmei de guisu

Da wu de a! Wo que yi renming ni wei dadi de dai zhi zhe, ni dang ti renmin binggong panjue, buyao shuncong siyu, yimian siyu shi ni panli an la de dadao; panli an la de dadao zhe, jiang yin wangque qingsuan zhi ri er shou yanli de xingfa
Wo meiyou turan di chuangzao tiandi wanwu, na shi bu xindao zhe de caice. Bei zai! Bu xindao de renmen jiang shou huoxing
Nandao wo shi xindao erqie xingshan zhe, xiang zai difang shang zuo'e zhe yiyang ma? Nandao wo shi jingwei zhe, xiang fangsi de ren yiyang ma
Zhe shi wo suo jiang shi ni de yi ben jixiang de jingdian, yibian tamen chensi jing zhong de jie wen, yibian you lizhi de renmen juewu
Wo jiang su lai man ciyu da wu de, nage puren zhenshi youmei! Ta que shi guiyi an la de
Dangshi, ta zai bangwan, jianyue neng jing li, neng benchi de madui
Ta shuo:“Wo dique yin xihao madui er wangjile wo de zhu, zhidao tamen bei weimu zhe zhule.”
Ta shuo:“Nimen jiang tamen gan huilai ba!” Ta jiu zhuoshou fumo naxie ma de tui bu he jing bu
Wo que yi kaoyan su lai man, wo ceng jiang yige routi tou zai ta de baozuo shang, ranhou, ta guiyi an la
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni she you wo, qiu ni shangci wo yige fei renhe ren suo yi jicheng de guo quan. Ni que shi bo shi de.”
Wo ceng wei ta zhifule feng, feng fengzhe ta de mingling xixi liuxiang tasuo yu dao di difang
Wo you wei ta zhifule yiqie neng jianzhu de huo neng qianshui de emo
yiji qita xuduo dai jiaoliao de emo
“Zhe shi wo suo te ci ni de, ni keyi jiang ta shi gei bieren, ye keyi jiang ta baoliu qilai, ni zong shi bu shou qingsuan de.”
Ta zai wo nali, dique huode chong'ai he youmei de guisu
Ni yingdang jiyi wo de puren an you bo. Dangshi, ta qidao ta de zhu shuo:“Emo que yi shi wo zaoshou xinku he xingfa.”
“Ni yong jiao ta de ba! Zhe shi keyong yi muyu han ke yong zuo yinliao de liangshui.”
Wo ceng yi ta de juanshu, he xiang tamen de, tong qi shangci ta. Na shi you wo jiangxia de ci'en, yeshi youyu jiaohui you lizhi de renmen
“Ni dang qinshou na yi ba cao, yong ta qu da yixia. Ni buyao weibei shiyue.” Wo que yi faxian ta shi jianren de. Na puren zhen youmei! Ta que shi guiyi an la de
Ni yingdang jiyi wo de puren yi bo la xin, yi si ha ge, ye er gu bai, tamen dou shi you nengli, you yanguang de
Wo shi tamen chengwei zhencheng de ren, yinwei tamen youyi zhong chunjie de de xing——chang nian houshi
Tamen zai wo nali, que shi te xuan de, que shi chun shan de
Ni dang jiyi yi sima yi, ai lei ye sai er, zhu lei ji fu lei, tamen dou shi chun shan de
Zhe shi yi zhong jiaohui. Jingwei de renmen, bidei xiangshou youmei de guisu——
yongjiu de leyuan, yuan men shi wei tamen chang kai de
Tamen zai yuan zhong, kao zai chuangshang; tamen zai yuan zhong jiao ren na zhongzhong shuiguo he yinliao lai
Tamen you bushi feili de, tongnian de banlu
Zhe shi yingxu nimen zai qingsuan ri zhihou de xiangshou de
Zhe que shi wo de jiyang, ta jiang yong bu qingjin
Zhe shi shishi. Fangdang zhe biding yao de yige zui e de guisu——
na jiushi huo yu, tamen jiang ru qizhong. Na wo ru zhen elie
Zhe shi shishi. Tamen jiang changshi xingfa, na xingfa shi hen re de yinliao, he hen leng de yinliao
hai you bie de tongyang elie de ge zhong yinliao
Zhexie shi yu nimen yiqi tujin de duiwu, tamen bu shou huanying, tamen bi ru huo yu
Tamen jiang shuo:“Buran! Nimen cai shi bu shou huanying de, nimen ceng ba women youhuo dao zhe zhong jingdi, zhe guisu zhen elie!”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Shei ba women youhuo dao zhe zhong jingdi, qiu ni shi shei zai huo yu zhong shou jiabei de xingfa.”
Tamen jiang shuo:“You xuduo ren, congqian women renwei tamen shi eren, xianzai zenme bujian tamen ne
Women ceng ba tamen dang xiaobing ne? Haishi women guoqu kanbuqi tamen ne?”
Ju huo yu zhe de zhenglun shi biran de
Ni shuo:“Wo zhishi yige jinggao zhe. Chu du yi zhizun de an la wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de
Ta shi tiandi wanwu de zhu, ta shi wanneng de, zhi she de.”
Ni shuo:“Na shi yige zhongda de xiaoxi
nimen que liqi ta
Dang shang jie de zhong tianshi zhenglun de shihou, wo bu zhidao tamen de qingxing
Wo zhi feng dao qishi shuo wo shi yige tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
Dangshi, ni de zhu ceng dui zhong tianshi shuo:“Wo biding yao yong ni chuangzao yige ren
dang wo ba ta zao chulai, bing jiang wo de jingshen chui ru ta de tinei de shihou, nimen dang wei ta dao shen koutou.”
Zhong tianshi quanti yitong koutou
wei yi bo lie si zi da, ta yuan shi bu xindao zhe
Zhu shuo:“Yi bo lie si a! Ni zenme bu ken dui wo qinshou zao de ren koutou ne? Ni zi da ne? Haishi ni ben shi gaoshang de ne?”
Ta shuo:“Wo bi ta gaogui; ni yong huo zao wo, yong ni zao ta.”
Zhu shuo:“Ni cong leyuan zhong chuqu ba! Ni que shi bei fangzhu de
ni bi zao wo de qi jue, zhidao baoying ri.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni kuandai wo dao renlei fuhuo zhi ri.”
Zhu shuo:“Ni biding bei kuandai
zhidao fuhuo shi lailin zhi ri.”
Ta shuo:“Yi ni de zun rong fashi, wo bi jiang tamen quanti jiayi youhuo
wei bu youhuo ni de chunjie de puren.”
Ta shuo:“Wo dehua que shi zhenli, wo zhi shuo zhenli
wo bi yi ni he renlei zhong shuncong ni de, tong qi chongman huo yu.”
Ni shuo:“Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou, wo bu shi zaoyao de
Zhe zhishi dui zhong shijie de jiaohui
Zai yige shiqi zhihou, nimen biding zhidao guanyu zhe jiaohui de xiaoxi.”
Zhe ben jingdian shi cong wanneng de, zhi rui de an la jiang shi de
Wo jiang shi ni zhe ben baohan zhenli de jingdian, ni dang chongbai an la, qiancheng jingyi, keshou zhengjiao

Zhen de, zhongcheng de zhengjiao zhi neng guiyu an la. She an la er yi ouxiang wei baohu zhe de ren shuo:“Women chongbai tamen, zhi wei tamen neng shi women qinjin an la.” An la jiang panjue tamen suo zhenglun de shifei. An la biding bu yindao shuohuang zhe, gu en zhe
Jiaruo an la yu shouyang ernu, ta bi cong tasuo zao de zhongsheng zhong jianxuan tasuo yiyu zhe. Zansong an la, chaojue wanwu. Ta shi du yi zhizun de an la
Ta benzhe zhenli, chuangzao tiandi; ta jie ye bu zhou, jie zhou bu ye; ta zhifu ri yue, gezi yunxing, dao yige dingqi. Zhen de, ta que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi she de

Ta cong yige ren chuangzao nimen, ranhou you yi nage renzao chu tonglei de pei'ou. Ta wei nimen er jiang ci ba zhi shengchu. Ta jiang nimen zaohua zai nimen de mu fu zhong, zai sanchong hei'an zhong, yi zaizao hua nimen. Na shi an la——nimen de zhu, zhuquan zhishi ta de; chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Nimen zenme beimiu ne

Ruguo nimen wang'en, name, an la que shi wu qiu yu nimen de, ta bu xiyue ta de zhong pu wang'enfuyi. Ruguo nimen ganxie, name, ta xiyue nimen de ganxie. Yige fu zui de ren, bu fu bieren de zui. Ranhou, nimen zhi guiyu nimen de zhu, ta yao jiang nimen de xingwei gaosu nimen. Ta que shi quanzhi xinshi zhe

Dang ren zaoyu huannan de shihou, qidao ta de zhu, er guiyi ta. Ranhou, ta shangci yi zhong enhui de shihou, ta jiu wangque yiqian ceng qiqiu an la jiechu huannan, erqie wei ta shuli ruogan pidi, yizhi bieren mishi an la de dadao. Ni shuo:“Ni zhanshi xiangshou ni de buxin ba! Ni biding shi juzhu huo yu de

(Jingkuang geng hao de, shi ni ne?) Haishi zai yejian zhuanxin shizhu, koutou lizheng, jinfang houshi, xiwang zhu en de ren ne?” Ni shuo:“You zhishi de yu wu zhishi de xiangdeng ma? Weiyou lizhi de ren neng juewu.”

Ni shuo:“Wo de xindao de zhong pu a! Nimen dang jingwei nimen de zhu. Zai jinshi xingshan zhe, de xiang mei bao. An la di dimian shi kuanguang de; weiyou jianren de ren, de xiangshou wanquan de, wuliang de baochou.”
Ni shuo:“Wo que yi fengming chongbai an la, qiancheng jingyi, keshou zhengjiao
Wo fengming wei shouxian shuncong de ren.”
Ni shuo:“Tangruo wo weikang wo de zhu, wo dique weiju zhongda ri de xingfa.”
Ni shuo:“Wo zhi chongbai an la, erqie chengxin guishun ta
Nimen yao she ta er chongbai shenme, jiu chongbai shenme ba!” Ni shuo:“Kui she de ren, que shi fuhuo ri sangshi zishen he juanshu de. Zhen de, na que shi mingxian de kui she.”
Tamen de shangmian, you ceng ceng de huo; tamen de xiamian, yeyou ceng ceng de huo. Na shi an la yong yi donghe ta de zhong pu de. Wo de zhong pu a! Nimen dang jingwei wo
Na yuanli chongbai ta wu te, er guiyi an la zhe, de wen jiayin. Ni xiang wo de pu renmen baoxi ba
Tamen qingting yanyu er cong qi zhi meide. Zhexie ren yi shou an la de yindao, zhexie ren que shi you lizhi de
Yingdang shou xingfa de bei panjue zhe,(bi ru huo yu), nandao ni hai xiang zhengjiu ta ma
Dan jingwei zhu zhe, jianglai de xiangshou loufang, lou shang jian lou, xia lin zhu he, na shi an la de yingxu, an la jiang bu shuangyue

Ni bu zhidao ma? An la cong tianshang jiangxia yushui, ranhou shi ta shenru di li, chengwei quanshui; ranhou, jie ta shengchu ge zhong zhuangjia, ranhou hemiao diaoling, ni kan ta bian cheng huang de, ranhou ta shi ta bian cheng suipian. Zai na limian, duiyu you lizhi zhe, dique youyi zhong jiaohui

An la wei yisilan er kaita qi xiongjin, gu neng jieshou zhu de guangming zhe, nandao gen xiongjin xia'ai de ren yiyang ma? Bei zai wei jiyi an la er xin ying zhe, zhe deng ren shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhi zhong de

An la ceng jiang shi zuimei de xun ci, jiushi qianhou yilu de, fanfu dingning de jingdian; weiju zhu de ren, wei ta er zhanli, ranhou, wei jiyi an la er anjing. Na shi an la de zhengdao, ta yong lai yindao tasuo yiyu yindao zhe, an la shi shei mi wu, shei jiu meiyou xiangdao
Fuhuo ri yi mianbu fangyu yanxing de ren, xiang bu shou xingfa zhe ma? Huozhe jiang dui bu yi zhe shuo:“Nimen changshi nimen suo huode de guobao ba!”
Zai tamen zhiqian de ren, que yijing fourenle. Gu xingfa cong tamen yi xiangbudao di difang lailin tamen
An la shi tamen zai jinshi changshi lingru, er houshi de xingfa biding shi geng zhongda de. Jiaruo tamen zhidao……
wo zai zhe “gulanjing” zhong, que yi wei renmen shele ge zhong piyu, yibian tamen juewu
Zhe shi yi ben alabo wen de wu xie qu de “gulanjing”, yibian tamen jingwei

An la she yige piyu: Yige nuli wei xuduo fenzheng de huoji suo gongyou; you you yige nuli zhuan guiyige zhuren; zhe liang ge nuli de qingzhuang xiangdeng ma? Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la! Buran, tamen daban buzhidao
Ni que shi yaosi de, tamen ye que shi yaosi de
Ranhou, zai fuhuo ri, nimen biding yao zai nimen de zhu nali, huxiang zhenglun
Jiajie an la de mingyi er zaoyao, bingqie fouren yi jianglin de shi yan zhe, you shei bi ta hai bu yi ne? Nandao huo yu li meiyou buxindao zhe de zhuchu ma
Chuanda shi yan de he chengren shi yan de, zhexie ren que shi jingwei de
Zai tamen de zhu nali, tamen de xiangshou tamen suo yu xiangshou de xingfu. Na shi dui xingshan zhe de baochou
yibian an la wei tamen er gouxiao tamen suozuo de zui'e, bing yi tamen suo xing de shangong baochou tamen
Nandao an la buneng shi ta de puren manzu ma? Tamen yi an la zhi wai de shenling donghe ni, an la shi shei mi wu, shei jiu meiyouxiangdao
an la yindao shei, renhe ren ye buneng shi ta mi wu. Nandao an la bushi wanneng de, cheng e de zhu ma

Ruguo ni wen tamen:“Shei chuangzaole tiandi?” Tamen biding shuo:“An la.” Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba, nimen she an la er qidao di naxie ou xiang, ruguo an la yu jiahai yu wo, tamen neng jiechu ta de shanghai ma? Ruguo an la yu shi en yu wo, tamen neng kouliu ta de enhui ma?” Ni shuo:“An la shi shi wo manzu de, tuo kao zhe zhi tuo kao an la.”
Ni shuo:“Wo de zongzu ya! Nimen jiu an nimen de fangshi er gongzuo ba! Wo que shi (an wo de fangshi) er gongzuo de, bujiu nimen jiu yao zhidao
lingru de xingfa jiang jiang yu shei, yongheng de xingfa jiang jia yu shei!”
Wo que yi wei shiren er gei ni jiang shi zhe bu baohan zhenli de jingdian, shei zunxun zhengdao, shei zi shou qi yi; shei wu ru qitu, shei zi shou qi hai. Ni jue bushi tamen de jianhu zhe

Renmen daole siwang de shihou, an la jiang tamen de linghun qu qu; shangwei dao si qi de renmen, dang tamen shuimian de shihou, an la ye jiang tamen de linghun qu qu. Ta yi panjue qi siwang zhe, ta kouliu tamen de linghun;(ta wei panjue qi siwang zhe), bian jiang tamen de linghun fang hui, zhi yi dingqi. Duiyu neng siwei de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang
Buran, tamen que she an la er yao ruogan shuo qing zhe. Ni shuo:“Jishi tamen meiyou renhe zhuquan, ye bu liaojie renhe shili, tamen ye neng shuo qing ma?”
Ni shuo:“Zhunxu shuo qing yu fou, quan gui an la jueding; tiandi de zhuquan, zhishi ta de. Ranhou, nimen zhi bei zhao gui ta.”
Youren zhi ti ji an la de shihou, bu xin houshi zhe bian manxin yanwu; youren ti ji an la yiwai de zhong shenling de shihou, tamen bian xinggaocailie
Ni shuo:“An la a! Tiandi de chuangzao zhe a! Quanzhi youming zhe a! Ni jiang wei ni de zhong pu er panjue tamen suo zhenglun de shifei.”

Jiaruo dimian shang de yiqie dou gui bu yi zhe suoyou, zai jia shang tongyang de yi fen, tamen biyong zuo shujin, yi shu qu fuhuo ri de yanxing. Tamen meiyou liao dao de xingfa, jiang cong an la nali, dui tamen xianxian chulai
Tamen shengqian suo fan de zui'e, ye jiang dui tamen xianxian chulai; tamen shengqian suo chaoxiao de xingfa, jiang lailin tamen

Ren zaoyu huannan shi, jiu qidao wo; yidan wo ba wo de endian shangci ta, ta bian shuo:“Wo huode zhe endian, zhi yin wo you teshu de zhishi bale.” Buran! Na shi yi zhong shiyan, dan tamen daban bu zhidao
Zai tamen zhiqian de ren, que yi shuoguo zheyang dehuale; dan tamen suo huode de caichan, duiyu tamen meiyou biyi
gu tamen yi zaoshou ziji suo gan de zui'e de guobao. Zhexie ren zhong bu yi de renmen, jiang zaoshou ziji suo gan de zui'e de guobao, tamen jue buneng taobi tianqian
Nandao tamen hai bu zhidao ma? An la yu shi shei de jiyang kuanyu, jiu shi shei de kuanyu; yu shi shei de jiyang jiongpo, jiu shi ta jiongpo. Duiyu xindao de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang
Ni shuo:“Wo de guofen de zihai de zhong pu a! Nimen dui an la de enhui buyao juewang, an la biding she you yiqie zuiguo, ta que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
Zai xingfa lailin nimen, er nimen bu huo yuanzhu yiqian, nimen dang gui yi nimen de zhu. Nimen dang shuncong ta
Zai xingfa bu zhi bu jue de jianglin nimen yiqian, nimen yingdang zuncong nimen de zhu jiang shi nimen de zuimei de xun ci.”
Yimian renhe ren shuo:“Wuhu tong zai! Wo yi daimanle dui an la ying jin de yiwu, yinwei wo cengjing shi chaoxiao zhe.”
Huo shuo:“Jiaruo an la yindao wo, wo biding shi jingwei zhe.”
Huo zai kanjian xingfa de shihou, shuo:“Dan yuan wo de fanhui chenshi, namo, wo yao bian cheng xingshan zhe.”
Buran! Wo de xuduo jixiang, que yi lailin ni, dan dou bei ni fourenle, ni wangzizunda, ni bian cheng yige bu xindao zhe
Fuhuo ri, ni jiang kan dao wumie an la de ren mianse bian hei. Nandao huo yu li meiyou zi da zhe de zhuchu ma
An la zhengjiu jingwei zhe tuoli kunan, bing shi tamen huode chenggong, tamen bu zao huohuan, ye bu youchou
An la shi chuangzao wanwu de, yeshi jianhu wanwu de
tiandi de yaoshi, zhishi ta de; buxin an la de jixiang zhe, cai shi kui she de
Ni shuo:“Wuzhi de ren a! Nandao nimen jiao wo chongbai an la yiwai de shenling ma?”
Ni he ni yiqian de ren, dou feng dao qishi shuo:“Ruguo ni yi wu pei zhu, ze ni de shangong, biding wuxiao, er ni biding chengwei kui she zhe
Buran! Ni yingdang zhi chongbai an la, ni ying dang zuo ganxie zhe.”

Tamen meiyou qieshi di renshi an la. Fuhuo ri, dadi jiang quanbu wo zai ta de quantou zhong, zhu tian jiang juan zai ta de youshou zhong. Zansong an la, chaojue wanwu, ta chao hu tamen suoyong qu pei ta de
Haojiao yi xiang, fan zai tiandi jian de, dou yao hundao, chufei an la suo yiyu de. Ranhou, haojiao zai yi xiang, tamen jiu huran zhan qilai, dong zhan xi gu de
Dadi jiang yin ta de zhu de guangming er liang; gongguo bao jiang chenlie chulai; zhong xianzhi he jianzheng zhemen jiang bei zhao lai, tamen jiang bei binggong caipan er bu shou kui wang
ren ren dou xiangshou ziji xingwei de wanquan de baochou, an la shi zhidao tamen de xingwei de

Buxindao zhe, jiang yi dui yi dui di bei gan ru huo yu, dai tamen lai dao huo yu qianmian de shihou, yu men kaile, guan yu de tianshi yao dui tamen shuo:“Nandao nimen zu zhong de shizhe meiyou lai dui nimen xuandu nimen de zhu de jixiang, bing jinggao nimen jiang you jinri de xiang hui ma? Tamen huida shuo:“Buran,(yijing xuanduguo)”. Ran'er, bu xindao de renmen, bi shou xingfa de panjue
Huozhe dui tamen shuo:“Nimen jin huo yu qu, bing yong ju qizhong ba! Zi da zhe de zhuchu zhen elie!”

Jingwei zhu zhe jiang yi dui yi dui di bei yao ru leyuan, dai tamen lai dao leyuan qianmian de shihou, yuan men kaile, guan yuan de tianshi yao dui tamen shuo:“Zhu nimen ping'an! Nimen yijing chunjiele, suoyi nimen jinqu yong ju ba!”
Tamen shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la! Ta dui women shijianle ta de yue yan, ta shi women jicheng letu, women zai leyuan zhong suiyi juzhu. Gongzuo zhe de baochou zhen youmei!”
Ni jiang jian zhong tianshi huan rao zai baozuo de sizhou, songyang tamen de zhu, tamen jiang bei binggong caipan. Huozhe shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la——zhong shijie de zhu!”
Ha yi, mi mu
Zhe bu jingdian jiang zi wanneng quanzhi de an la——
she you zuiguo, zhun ren chanhui, yanli chengfa, bo shi enhui de zhu. Chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de; ta que shi zuihou de guisu
Zhiyou bu xindao zhe, wei an la de jixiang er zhenglun. Ni buyao bei tamen zai ge chengshi de wanglai suo mihuo

Zai tamen zhiqian, nu ha de minzu, he houlai de ge minzu, dou fouren zhong shizhe, ge minzu dou yu jiahai ben zu de shizhe; tamen ju miu wang er zhenglun, yu jie ci bodao zhenli, guwo chengzhile tamen. Wo de xingfa shi zenyang de
Bu xindao zhe dang zheyang shou ni de zhu de panjue, tamen shi juzhu huo yu de

Danfu baozuo de he huanrao baozuo de (tianshi), dou zansong tamen de zhu, dou gui xin ta, dou wei xindao zhe qiurao, tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Zai enhui he zhishi fangmian, ni shi baoluowanxiang de, qiu ni she you huiguo zi xin, erqie zunxun ni de zhengdao zhe. Qiu ni baohu tamen, mian shou huo yu de xingfa
Women de zhu a! Qiu ni rang tamen he tamen de xingshan de zuxian, qizi he zisun, yitong jinru ni suo yingxu tamen de yongjiu de leyuan. Ni que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi rui de
Qiu ni shi tamen de mian yu xingfa. Zai na ri, ni shi shei de mian yu xingfa, ni yi ci minle shei, na que shi weida de chenggong.”
Bu xindao zhe, biding yao bei zhaohuan shuo:“An la tonghen nimen, shen yu nimen tonghen zishen, yinwei nimen ceng bei zhao zhi zhengxin, dan nimen bu xin.”
Tamen you shuo:“Women de zhu a! Ni shi women si liang ci, ni shi women sheng liang ci, gu women chengren women de zuiguole. Hai neng you yitiao chulu ma?”
Zhe shi yinwei, dang youren qidao du yi de an la de shihou, nimen fouren an la; ruguo youren yi wu pei ta de shihou, nimen jiu chengren na shi heli de, gu panjue zhi gui an la——zhigao zhi da de zhu
Ta ba ta de jixiang zhaoshi nimen, ta wei nimen cong tianshang jiangxia jiyang; zhiyou guiyi zhe neng juewu
Nimen dang qidao an la, qiancheng jingyi, ke shou zhengjiao, jishi bu xindao zhe bu yuanyi
Ta shi zhizun de, shi you baozuo de, ta yi ziji de jueding fachu de qishi, shouyu tasuo yiyu de puren, yibian ta jinggao zhongren yi xiang hui zhi ri——
tamen jiang chuxian zhi ri, tamen de shi, dui an la hao wu yinni.“Jinri de zhuquan shi shei de?”“Shi du yi zhizun de an la de.”
Jinri, ren ren dou wei ziji suo zuo de er shou baochou. Jinri, hao wu kui wang, an la que shi jihe shensu de
Ni yingdang yi linjin zhi ri jinggao tamen, na shi tamen de xin jiang sheng dao yanhou, ta manfu youchou. Bu yi zhe, jiang meiyou renhe qinyou, ye meiyou zouxiao de shuo qing zhe
Ta zhidao touyan he xinshi
An la ben zhenli er caipan. Tamen she ta er chongbai de, bu feng renhe wu er caipan. An la que shi quanzhi de, que shi quan ming de

Nandao tamen meiyou zai da dishang luxing yi guancha qian ren de jieju shi zenyang de ma? Qian ren bi tamen shili geng da, chengji geng duo; dan an la yin tamen de zuiguo er chengzhi tamen, tamen dui an la meiyou renhe baohu zhe
Na shi yinwei wo de zhong shizhe ceng daizhe xuduo mingzheng lailin tamen, dan tamen bu gui xin, gu an la chengfale tamen. Ta que shi zhi gang de. Ta de xingfa shi yanli de
wo que yi paiqian mu sa daizhe wo de jixiang he mingzheng
qu jiaohua falao, ha man he ge lun, dan tamen shuo:“Ta shi miu wang de shushi.”
Ta ba cong wo zheli fachu de zhenli zhaoshi tamen de shihou, tamen shuo:“Nimen dang shalu yu ta yitong xindao zhe de erzi, zhi liu xia tamen de nu'er.” Buxindao zhe de jice, zhi zai mi wu zhong
Falao shuo:“Nimen rang wo sha si mu sa! Jiao ta qidao ta de zhu qu ba! Wo dique pa ta gaibian nimen de zongjiao, huo zai guonei zuoluan.”
Mu sa shuo:“Wo que yi jiu bi yu wo de zhu, yi ji nimen de zhu, mian zao bu xin qingsuan ri de yiqie zi da zhe de qinhai.”

Falao zu zhong yige mimi gui xin de xinshi shuo:“Yige ren ba cong nimen de zhu fachu de mingzheng zhaoshi nimen, bing shuo:‘Wo de zhu shi an la’, nimen jiu yao shalu ta ma? Ruguo ta shi yige shuohuang zhe, namo, ta zi shou huangyan zhi hai; ruguo ta shi yige chengshi zhe, namo, tasuoyong yi donghe nimen de zainan, jiang you yibufen lailin nimen, an la biding bu yindao guofen de chang shuohuangyan zhe

Wo de zongzu a! Jinri nimen yongyou guo quan, nimen zai guo zhong chengxiong. Ruguo an la de xingfa lailin, namo, shei zhu women dikang ta ne?” Falao shuo:“Wo zhi yi wo de zhuzhang zhishi nimen, wo zhi yindao nimen zou shang zhengdao.”
Xindao zhe shuo:“Wo de zongzu a! Wo que pa nimen zaoyu qian ren suo zaoyu de zainan
ru nu ha de zongzu, a de ren, sai mo de ren, yiji zai tamen zhihou de ren suo zaoshou de zaihuo yiyang. An la shi bu yu kui wang zhong pu de
Wo de zongzu a! Wo dique wei nimen danxin huxiang hujiao zhi ri
zai na ri, nimen jiang zhuanshen tui hou, er meiyou renhe baohu zhe neng shi nimen mian shou an la de chengfa. An la shi shei mi wu, shei jiu meiyou xiangdao

Yiqian you su fu que yi jiang xuduo mingzheng zhaoshi nimen, dan nimen dui ta suo zhaoshi nimen de mingzheng, yiran zai yihuo zhong, zhidao ta siqu de shihou, nimen hai shuo:‘Zai ta zhihou, an la zaibu hui paiqian renhe shizhele.’ An la zheyang shi guofen de huaiyi zhe mi wu.”
Meiyou zhenpingshiju, er zhenglun an la de jixiang zhe, ju an la he zhong xinshi kan lai, shi hen taoyan de. An la zheyang fengbi yiqie zi da de gao'ao zhe de xin
Falao shuo:“Ha man a! Ni wei wo jianzao yizuo gaolou, huoxu wo neng zhaodao ruogan xiansuo——

tianshang de xiansuo, yin'er neng kuijian mu sa de shenling; wo quexin ta shi yige shuo huang zhe.” Falao de e xing, zheyang mihuole ta ziji, fang'aile ta zou shang zhengdao. Falao de jice, zhi guiyu huimie
Nage gui xinzhe you shuo:“Wo de zongzu a! Nimen shuncong wo, wo jiu ba nimen yin shang zhengdao
Wo de zongzu a! Jinshi de shenghuo, zhishi yi zhong xiangshou, houshi cai shi anzhai
Zuo'e zhe zhi shou tongyang de e bao; xingshan erqie xindao de nanzi huo nuzi, jiang ru leyuan, shou wuliang de gongji
Wo de zongzu a! Zenme wo zhao nimen yu de du, er nimen que zhao wo yu huo yu ne
Nimen jiao wo buyao xin'an la, er yi wo suo buzhi de shiwu pei ta; wo que yao jiao nimen chongbai wanneng de, zhi she de zhu
Qishi, nimen zhao wo qu chongbai de dongxi, zai jinshi he houshi, dou buneng yingda renhe qidao. Women de guisu shi an la, guofen zhe bi shi huo yu de jumin
Nimen jianglai hui xiangqi wo dui nimen shuo dehua. Wo ba wo de shiqing weituo an la, an la que shi mingcha zhong pu de.”
An la baohu ta mian zao tamen suo jimou de huohai, bing yi yanxing jiang yu falao de zongzu
tamen zhaoxi shou huoxing. Fuhuo shi lailin zhi ri, huozhe jiang shuo:“Nimen rang falao de zongzu jinqu shou zui yanli de xingfa ba!”
Na shi, tamen zai huo yu zhong huxiang zhenglun, nuoruo zhe dui zi da zhe shuo:“Women que yi zuoguo nimen de shuncong zhe, nimen neng ti women jiechu yibufen huoxing ma?”
Zi da zhe shuo:“Women dajia dique dou zai huo yu zhong, an la que yi ti zhong pu panjuele.”
Zai huo yu li de ren dui guanli huo yu de tianshi shuo:“Qing nimen qidao nimen de zhu, qiu ta gei women jianqing yi ri de xingfa.”
Tamen shuo:“Nandao nimen zu zhong de shizhe, meiyou zhaoshi nimen ruogan mingzheng ma?” Tamen shuo:“Buran!” Tianshimen shuo:“Nimen qidao ba! Dan buxindao zhe de qidao zhi zai mi wu zhong.”
Wo biding yuanzhu wo de zhong shizhe he zhong xinshi, zai jinshi shenghuo zhong, he zai zhong jianzheng qili zhi ri——
bu yi zhe de tuoci wu bi yu tamen zhi ri, tamen jiang zao qi jue, tamen jiang shou houshi de xingfa
Wo que yi jiang zhengdao ciyu mu sa, wo que yi shi yiselie de houyi jicheng tian jing
yong zuo you xinling zhe de xiangdao he jiaohui
Gu ni dang jianren, an la de yingxu, que shi zhenshi de. Ni yingdang wei ni de guoshi er qiurao, ni yingdang zhaoxi zansong ni de zhu

Meiyou zhenpingshiju er zhenglun an la de jixiang zhe, tamen de xiongzhong, dique zhiyou yige niantou, jiushi yao xiang dadao tamen jue buneng dadao de weida. Gu ni dang qiu bi yu an la, ta que shi quan cong de, que shi quan ming de
Chuangzao tiandi, shi bi zaizao renlei geng nan de, dan shiren daban bu zhidao
Wu yan zhe yu you yan zhe shi bu xiangdeng de; xindao erqie xingshan zhe yu zuo'e zhe yeshi bu xiangdeng de, dan nimen hen shao juewu
Fuhuo shi biding lailin, zhe shi hao wuyi yi de; dan zhongren daban bu xin
Nimen de zhu shuo:“Nimen yao qidao wo, wo jiu yingda nimen; bu ken chongbai wo de jiao'ao zi da zhemen, tamen jiang beijian de ru huo yu.”
An la wei nimen chuangzao heiye, yibian nimen anxi; chuangzao baizhou, yibian nimen guankan; an la duiyu renlei, que shi you enhui de, dan renlei daban bu ganxie
Na shi an la, shi nimen de zhu, shi wanwu de chuangzao zhe; chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Nimen zenme ruci beimiu ne
Fouren an la de jixiang zhe, jiushi zheyang beimiu de

An la wei nimen yi dimian wei ju chu, yi tiankong wei fangwu, ta yi xingxiang fuyu nimen, er shi nimen de xingxiang youmei, ta gongji nimen jiamei de shipin. Na shi an la, nimen de zhu. Duo fu zai an la!——Zhong shijie de zhu
Ta que shi yongsheng de, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de, gu nimen dang qidao ta, qiancheng jingyi, ke shou zhengjiao. Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la——zhong shijie de zhu

Ni shuo:“Dang xuduo mingzheng cong wo de zhu lailin wo de shihou, wo que yi feng dao jinling, bu zhun wo chongbai nimen she an la er chongbai de; wo que yi feng dao mingling, jiao wo fucong zhong shijie de zhu.”

Ta chuangzaole nimen, xian yong nitu, ji yong jingye, ji yong xiekuai, ranhou shi nimen chusheng wei ying'er, ranhou rang nimen chengnian, ranhou rang nimen bian cheng laoren——nimen zhong you yaozhe de——ranhou, rang nimen huo dao yige dingqi, yibian nimen mingli
Ta neng shi rensheng, neng shi ren si. Dang ta panjue yi jian shi de shihou, ta zhi dui na jian shi shuo “you”, ta jiu youle
Ni wei jian zhenglun an la de jixiang zhe shi zenyang beimiu ma
Tamen fouren tian jing, fouren wo jiang shi gei zhong shizhe de jixiang, tamen bujiu hui zhidao (houguo de)
Na shi, tie quan he tie lian, jiang zai tamen de jing shang
tamen jiang bei tuo ru feishui zhong, ranhou tamen jiang zai huo zhong bei shaozhuo
Ranhou you tianshi dui tamen shuo:“Nimen she an la er chongbai de (ouxiang) zai nali ne?”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Tamen yi huibi womenle. Qishi, yiqian women bing wei qidao renhe wu.” An la zheyang shi bu xindao zhe mi wu
Na shi yinwei nimen zai difang shang bu gai xihuan er xihuan, yeshi yinwei nimen tai deyile
Nimen ru huo yu de men er yong ju qizhong ba! Zi da zhe de zhuchu zhen elie

Ni dang jianren, an la de yingxu que shi zhenshi de. Ruguo wo yao zhaoshi ni yidian wo yong yi donghe tamen de xingfa,(name, wo dui tamen que shi quanneng de) she huo wo shi ni qushi, namo, tamen zhi bei zhao guiyu wo

Zai ni zhiqian, wo que yi paiqian xuduo shizhe, tamen zhong you wo yi gaosu ni de, you wo wei gaosu ni de. Renhe shizhe, bu ying zhaoshi jixiang, chufei huode an la de xuke. Dang an la de mingling lailin de shihou, zhongsheng jiang yi zhenli er bei panjue; na shi, fandui zhenli de ren jiang zao kui she
An la wei nimen chuangzaole shengchu, yibian nimen cheng qi, bing shiyong tamen de rou
nimen you tamen huode xuduo liyi, yibian nimen qizhe tamen, qu xunqiu nimen xiongzhong de xuyao, nimen yong tamen he chuanbo zaiyun huowu
Ta zhaoshi nimen ta de jixiang. Nimen fouren an la de shenme jixiang ne

Nandao tamen meiyou zai da dishang luxing, yin'er shicha qian ren de jieju shi zenyang de ma? Qian ren bi tamen shili geng da, chengji geng duo; dan qian ren suo huode de, duiyu ziji bing meiyou she me biyi
Dang tamen ge zu zhong de zhong shizhe zhaoshi tamen xuduo jixiang de shihou, tamen yin ziji suoyou de xuewen er yangyang deyi, tamen suo chaoxiao de xingfa, sui jianglin tamen
Dang tamen kanjian wo de xingfa de shihou, tamen shuo:“Women zhi xin du yi de an la, buxin women suoyong yi pipei ta de.”
Dang tamen kanjian wo de xingfa de shihou, tamen de xinyang dui tamen hao wu biyi. An la yi ci wei zhong pu de yi shiqu de changdao. Na shi, buxindao zhe zaoshoule kui she
Ha yi, mi mu
Zhe shi cong zhiren zhi ci de zhu jiangxia de qishi
Zhe shi yi bu jie wen xiangming de tian jing, shi wei you zhishi de minzhong er jiang shi de alabo wen de (“gulanjing”)
keyi zuo baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe; dan tamen daban tuibi er bu ken tingcong

Tamen shuo:“Women de xin zai mengbi zhong, buneng liaojie ni dui women de jiaodao, women de erduo you zhong ting; zai women he ni zhi jian you yidao pingzhang. Ni gan ni de ba, women biding yao gan women de!”

Ni shuo:“Wo gen nimen yiyang, zhishi yige fanren, wo feng dao qishi:‘Nimen suo yingdang chongbai de, zhishi du yi de zhuzai. Suoyi nimen yingdang zun zhenglu er quxiang ta, yingdang xiang ta qiurao.’ Shang zai yi wu pei zhu zhe!”
Tamen bu na tian ke, buxin houshi
Xindao erqie xingshan zhe bi shou buduan de baochou
Ni shuo:“Nimen zhen buxin zai liang rinei chuangzao dadi zhe, er yao wei ta shuli xuduo pidi ma? Na shi zhong shijie de zhu.”
Ta zai dadishang chuangzao xuduo shanyue, ta jiang fu yu da di, bing yuding da dishang zhongsheng de shiwu. Naxie shi, zai zhengzheng de si tian jiu wanchengle. Na shi yong lai dafu xunwen zhe de
Ranhou, ta zhiyu zao tian, na shi, tian haishi zhengqi. Ta dui tiandi shuo:“Ni lia shunfu de, huo mianqiang de lai ba!” Ta lia shuo:“Wo lia shunfu de laile.”
Ta zai liang rinei chuangzaole qi ceng tian, ta yi ta de mingling qishi ge tian de jumin, ta yi zhong xing dianzhui zuidi de tian, bing jiayi baohu, na shi wanneng de, quanzhi de zhu de yuding
Ruguo tamen tuibi, ni jiu shuo:“Wo jinggao nimen yi zhong xingfa, ta xiang a de ren he sai mo de ren suo shou de xingfa yiyang.”

Dangshi, zhong shizhe cong tamen de qianhou lailin tamen, shuo:“Chu an la wai, nimen buyao chongbai renhe wu.” Tamen shuo:“Jiaruo women de zhu yiyu, ta bi jiangxia xuduo tianshi, women biding bu xin nimen suo feng de shiming.”

Zhiyu a de ren, tamen bu gai zai difang shang wangzizunda, tamen shuo:“Shei bi women nengli geng qiangda ne?” Nandao tamen bu zhidao chuangzao tamen de an la bi tamen geng qiangda ma? Tamen fourenle wo de xuduo jixiang
wo shi baofeng zai ruogan xiong ri li shanghai tamen, shi tamen zai jinshi shenghuo zhong changshi lingru de xingfa, er houshi de xingfa, que shi geng lingru de, tamen jiang bu huo yuanzhu
Zhi yu sai mo de ren, ze wo ceng yindao tamen, dan tamen she zhengdao er qu mi wu, gu lingru de xingfa de pili yin tamen de xingwei er hongjile tamen
Wo ceng zhengjiule xindao er jingwei zhe
Zai na ri, an la de diren jiang bei zhaoji dao huo yu qu. Tamen shi shou yueshu de
Dai tamen lai dao huo yu de shihou, tamen de ermu pifu jiang zuozheng tamen de xingwei

Tamen jiang dui ziji de pifu shuo:“Nimen weisheme zuo bu liyu women de jianzheng ne?” Tamen jiang shuo:“Neng shi wanwu shuohua de an la, yi shi women shuohuale. Ta chuci chuangzao nimen, nimen zhi bei zhao guiyu ta.”
Guoqu, nimen meiyou fangbei nimen de ermu pifu hui zuo bu liyu nimen de jianzheng, dan nimen caixiang an la bu zhidao nimen suozuo de xuduo shiqing
Nimen duiyu nimen de zhu suo huai de zhe zhong caixiang yi haile nimen, gu nimen bian chengle kui she zhe
Ruguo tamen neng renshou, name, huo yu jiushi tamen de zhuchu; ruguo tamen yao en, yuanliang, name, tamen jue bude yao en

Wo yi wei tamen yuding xuduo mo ban, er naxie mo ban, yi tamen shengqian huo sihou de shiqing mihuo tamen, tamen yingdang shou xingfa de panjue, er ru yu yiqian shiqu de jingling he renlei de ruogan minzu zhi zhong, er yuyan dui tamen shixian, tamen que shi kui she zhe
Bu xindao zhe shuo:“Nimen buyao ting zhe “gulanjing”, nimen yingdang raoluan song jing de shengyin, huoxu nimen jiang huode shengli.”
Wo bi shi bu xindao zhe changshi yanli de xingfa, wo bi yi zui lie de baochou baoda tamen de zui'e
Na jiushi an la de diren suo shou de baochou——huo yu, tamen zai huo yu zhong you yongjiu de zhuzhai, na shi yinwei tamen fouren wo de jixiang
Bu xindao zhe shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni zhaoshi women naxie ceng shi women mi wu de jingling he renlei, rang women jiang tamen ta zai women de jiaoxia, yibian tamen bian cheng zui beijian de.”
Fan shuoguo “women de zhu shi an la”, ranhou zunxun zhengdao zhe, zhong tianshi jiang lailin tamen, shuo:“Nimen buyao kongju, buyao youchou, nimen yingdang wei nimen de bei yu xu de leyuan er gaoxing
Zai jinshi he houshi, women dou shi nimen de baohu zhe. Nimen zai leyuan li jiang xiangshou nimen suo aihao de yiqie, nimen zai leyuan li jiang xiangshou nimen suo yaoqiu de yiqie
Na shi zhiren zhi ci de zhu suo ci de yan shi.”
Zhao ren xinyang an la, li xingshan gong, bingqie shuo:“Wo que shi musilin” de ren, zai yanci fangmian, you shei bi ta geng youmei ne
Shan e bushi yiyang de. Ni yingdang yi zuimei de pinxing qu duifu elie de pinxing, name, yu ni xiang chou zhe, huran jian bian de qin ru miyou
Wei jianren zhe, huo ci meide, wei you dafu fen zhe, huo ci meide
Ruguo emo songyong ni, ni yingdang qiu bi yu an la. Ta que shi quan cong de, que shi quanzhi de
Zhouye yu ri yue, dou shi ta de jixiang. Nimen buyao xiang ri yue koutou, nimen yingdang xiang chuangzao naxie jixiang de an la koutou, ruguo nimen shi chongbai ta dehua
Ruguo tamen zi da, name, zai ni de zhu nali de zhong tianshi, ze zhouye zansong ta, tamen bing buyanjuan de

Ni kan dadi shi ganku de, dang wo jiangxia yushui de shihou, ta bian huodong er pengzhang qilai, zhe yeshi ta de jixiang. Neng shi dadi fuhuo zhe, bi neng shi siren fuhuo, ta duiyu wanshi, que shi quanneng de

Qujie wo de tian jing zhe, bi buneng yinni qilai, bu rang wo kanjian tamen. Shi zai fuhuo ri bei touru huo yu zhe hao ne? Haishi zai fuhuo ri anquan zhe hao ne? Nimen yao zuo shenme, jiu suibian zuo shenme ba! Ta que shi mingcha nimen de xingwei de
Buxin yi jianglin de jiaohui de ren,(wo yao chengfa ta.) Na jiaohui que shi jiangu de jingdian
xuwei buneng cong ta de qianhou jingong ta, ta shi cong zhi rui de, ke song de zhu jiang shi de
Renmen dui ni shuo de, buguo shi yiwang dui zhong shizhe shuoguo de lanyan, ni de zhu, que shi you she you de, que shi you tong cheng de

Jiaruo wo jiang shi yi bu waiguoyu de “gulanjing”, tamen biding hui shuo:“Zenme bu jieshi qizhong de jie wen ne? Yi bu waiguoyu de jingdian he yige alabo de xianzhi ma?” Ni shuo:“Ta shi xindao zhe de xiangdao he yaofang; buxindao zhe ting'erbuwen, shi'erbujian, yinwei zhexie ren shi cong yuan chu bei hanjiao de.”
Wo que yi ba tian jing shouyu mu sa,, dan zhongren wei neitian jing er fenqi, jiaruo meiyou yiju hua cong ni de zhu yuxian fachu, tamen bi shou caipan. Tamen duiyu ta, que shi zai yihuo zhi zhong
Xingshan zhe zi shou qi yi, zuo'e zhe zi shou qi hai. Ni de zhu jue bu hui kui wang zhong pu

Guanyu fuhuo shi de renshi, zhi guiyu ta; guoshi de tuo e, nuxing de huaiyun he fenmian, wu yi buzai ta de dong jian zhong. Zai na ri, ta jiang wen tamen:“Nimen wangcheng wei wo de huoban de, zai nali ne?” Tamen jiang shuo:“Women baogao ni, women zhong jue meiyou yige ren neng zuozheng zhe jian shi.”
Tamen shengqian suo qidao de, jiang huibi tamen, tamen jiang quexin ziji wu suo tao zui
Ren qifu bu yan, yi zao huohuan jiu huixin juewang

Ta zaoyu huannan zhihou, ruguo wo shi ta changshi cong wo jiangxia de enhui, ta biding shuo:“Zhe shi wo yong gongzuo huan lai de. Wo buxin fuhuo shi hui daolai. Ruguo wo bei zhao qu jian wo de zhu, ze wo zai ta nali bi shou zhi shan de baochou.” Wo bi jiang bu xindao zhe de xingwei gaosu tamen, wo bi shi tamen changshi yanzhong de xingfa
Dang wo shi en yu ren de shihou, ta wang'en er zi da; dang ta zaoyu huohuan de shihou, ta qidao bu jue
Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Ruguo “gulanjing” shi cong an la nali jiang shi de, er nimen bu xin ta, name, you shei bi changyuan weibei zhenli zhe geng mi wu ne?”
Wo jiang zai sifang he zai tamen zishen zhong, ba wo de xuduo jixiang zhaoshi tamen, zhidao tamen mingbai “gulanjing” que shi zhenli. Nandao ni de zhu neng jianzheng wanwu hai bugou ma
Zhen de, tamen dique huaiyi jianglai shifou yu tamen de zhu huimian. Zhen de, ta que shi zhouzhi wanwu de
Ha yi, mi mu
A ni, xi ni, ga fu
Wanneng de, zhi rui de an la, zheyang qishi ni he ni yiqian de zhong xianzhi
Tiandi wanwu dou shi ta de; ta que shi zhigaowushang de, que shi zhi da de
Zhu tianti jihu cong shangmian polie, zhong tianshi zansong tamen de zhu, bing wei dimian shang de ren qiurao. Zhen de, an la que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
She an la er ze qu baohu zhe de ren, an la shi jianshi tamen de, ni jue bushi tamen de jianhu zhe

Wo zheyang qishi ni yi ben alabo wen de “gulanjing”, yibian ni jinggao shou yi ji qi sizhou de jumin, yibian ni yugao hao wuyi yi de jihe ri. Yibufen ren jiang zai leyuan zhong, yibufen ren jiang zai liehuo zhong
Jiaruo an la yiyu, ta bi shi tamen xinfeng tongyi zongjiao, dan ta shi tasuo yiyu zhe ru yu ta de enhui zhong; bu yi de renmen, jue wu baohu zhe, ye wu yuanzhu zhe
Tamen zenme she ta er ze qu bie de baohu zhe ne? An la cai shi baohu zhe, ta neng shi sizhe fuhuo, ta duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de
Wulun nimen zhenglun shenme shi, dou yao gui an la panjue. Na shi an la, shi wo de zhu, wo zhi tuo kao ta, wo zhi guiyi ta

Ta shi tiandi de chuangzao zhe, ta yi nimen de tonglei wei nimen de qizi; shi nimen de shengchu tonglei xiangpei; ta jie ci shi nimen fanzhi. Renhe wu dou bushi xiang ta. Ta que shi quan cong de, que shi quan ming de
Tiandi de baozang, zhishi ta de; ta yu shi shei de jiyang kuanyu, jiu shi ta kuanyu; yu shi shei de jiyang jiongpo, jiu shi ta jiongpo; ta shi quanzhi wanwu de

Ta yi wei nimen zhiding zhengjiao, jiushi tasuo mingling nu ha de, tasuo qishi ni de, ta mingling yi bo la xin, mu sa he er sa de zongjiao. Nimen yingdang jin shouzhengjiao, buyao wei zhengjiao er fen men bie hu. Yi wu pei zhu de renmen, yiwei ni suo jiaodao tamen de shi shi nankan di. An la jiang tasuo yiyu zhe zhaozhi yu zheng jiao, jiang guiyi ta zhe yindao yu zhenli

Zhishi lailin tamen zhihou, tamen cai wei huxiang jidu er fen paibie. Jiaruo bu shi yinwei ni de zhu yi yuxian shuoguo yao yanqi chengzhi, name, tamen bi yi shou caipanle. Zai tamen zhihou jicheng tian jing de renmen, duiyu tian jing, dique zai shi ren youyu de yihuo zhong

Ni yingdang zhao ren yu ci dao, ni yingdang jin zun tianming, chang shou zhengdao, buyao shuncong tamen de siyu. Ni shuo:“Wo quexin an la suo jiang shi de jingdian, wo fengming gongping daiyu nimen. An la shi women de zhu, yeshi nimen de zhu. Women you women de gongzuo, nimen you nimen de gongzuo, women bubi he nimen bianbo. An la jiang jihe women, ta shi weiyi de guisu.”
Zhongren ji ying zhao er xinfeng an la de zongjiao hou, wei ta er bianbo zhe, ju tamen de zhu kan lai, tamen de zhengju shi wuxiao de, tamen yingdang zao qian nu, bing shou yanxing
An la jiang shi baohan zhenli de jingdian, bing jiang shi gongping. Ni zenme neng zhidao ne? Fuhuo shi huoxu shi linjin de

Buxin fuhuo shi de renmen yaoqiu ta zaori shixian; er quexin ta de renmen que pa ta zaori shixian, bingqie zhidao ta shi zhenshi de. Zhen de, wei fuhuo shi'er zhengbian de renmen, dique zai bu jin qingli de mi wu zhi zhong
An la shi ci'ai ta de zhong pu de, ta gongji tasuo yiyu gongji de ren, ta que shi zhi gang de, que shi wanneng de
Shei yu de houshi de shouhuo, wo jiu jia zeng shei de shouhuo; shei yu de jinshi de shouhuo, wo jiu gei shei yidian jinshi de shouhuo; ta zai houshi, meiyou fen er
Nandao tamen you xuduo pei zhu, ceng wei tamen zhiding an la suo wei xuke de zongjiao ma? Jiaruo meiyou na pan ci, tamen bi shou panjue, bu yi de renmen, bi shou tongku de xingfa

Ni jianglai yao kanjian bu yi de renmen wei tamen suo fan de zui'e er kongju, naxie zui'e de chengfa biding lailin tamen. Xindao erqie xingshan de renmen, jianglai yao juzhu zai leyuan de shengdi zhong, zai tamen de zhu nali, tamen de xiangshou tamen suo yu xiangshou de; na que shi hong en

Na shi an la yong lai xiang ta naxie xindao erqie xingshan de pu renmen baoxi de. Ni shuo:“Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu baochou, dan qiu wei tongzu er qin'ai.” Shei xing yi jian shanshi, wo yao jiabei di baochou shei. An la que shi zhi she de, que shi shan bao de
Buran, tamen shuo:“Ta jiajie an la de mingyi er niezao.” Ruguo an la yiyu, ta jiu fengbi ni de xin. An la yi qi wenci mosha xuwei, zhengshi zhenli, ta que shi quanzhi xinshi de
Ta zhunxu ta de zhong pu huiguo, ta raoshu yiqie zui'e, ta zhidao nimen de xingwei
Ta daying xindao erqie xingshan zhe de qidao, ta yi endian jia ci tamen. Bu xindao zhe jiang shou yanli de xingfa

Ruguo an la shi ta de pu renmen de xiangshou kuanyu de jiyang, tamen bi zai da dishang zuo'e; dan ta yi dingliang er jiangxia tasuo yu jiang de jiyang. Ta duiyu ta de pu renmen, que shi che zhi de, que shi mingcha de
Ta zai tamen juewang zhihou, jiangxia shi yu, guang shile ta de enhui, ta que shi baohu zhe, que shi ke song de
Ta de jixiang zhi yi, shi chuangzao tiandi he ta zai tiandi jian suo sanbu de ge zhong dongwu, ta neng ziyou de jiang tamen jihe zai yiqi
Fan nimen suo zaoyu de zainan, dou shi youyu nimen suozuo de zui'e; ta raoshu nimen de xuduo zuiguo
Nimen zai da dishang jue buneng taobi tianqian, chu an la wai, nimen meiyou renhe baohu zhe he yuanzhu zhe
Ta de jixiang zhi yi, shi zai haizhong xiang shanyue yiban de chuanbo
Ruguo ta yiyu, ta jiu shi feng jingzhi, er chuanbo tingdun zai haimian shang. Duiyu mei ge jianren zhe, ganxie zhe, qizhong que you xuduo jixiang
Ta huo yin tamen suozuo de zui'e, er shi naxie chuanbo chenmo; ta raoshu xuduo ren de zuiguo
Wei wo de jixiang er zhenglun de renmen, zhidao tamen ziji jue wu chu tao zui
Fan nimen suo shou ci de, wulun shenme, dou shi jinshi shenghuo de xiangshou. Zai an la nali de baochou, shi geng youmei de, shi geng changjiu de, na shi guiyu xindao er zhi tuo kao an la zhe
ye guiyu yuanli dazui he choushi, qie zai fanu shi neng she you zhe
Ye guiyu yingda zhu de haozhao, qie jin shou bai gong zhe; tamen de shiwu, shi you xieshang er jueding de, tamen fen she wo suo ciyu tamen de
ye guiyu neng fankang ziji suo zaoyu de qinhai zhe
E xing ying de tongyang de e bao. Shei yuan raoshu erqie hejie, an la bi baochou shei. An la que shi bu xi'ai bu yi zhe de
Shou ren qiwu er jinxing baofu de renmen, shi wu ke zebei de
Ying shou zebei de, shi qiwu taren, bingqie zai difang shang manheng wuli zhe; zhexie ren jiang shou tongku de xingfa
Fan neng renshou er jiayi she you zhe, tamen di na zhong xingwei, que shi yinggai juexin zuo de shiqing
An la shi shei mi wu, zai an la de qi juehou, shei meiyou renhe baohu zhe. Ni jianglai yao kanjian bu yi zhe yanjian xingfa shi shuo:“Hai you fanhui (chenshi) de tujing ma?”

Ni jianglai yao kanjian tamen shen lin huo yu, yin beijian er gongjing, anzhong tou kan. Xindao zhe jiang shuo:“Kui she de renmen, zai fuhuo ri que shi sangshi zishen he jiashu de.” Zhen de, bu yi zhe bi zai yongheng de xingfa zhong
Chu an la wai, tamen jiang meiyou renhe pengyou yuanzhu tamen. An la shi shei mi wu, shei jiu meiyou daolu
Zai buke kangju zhi ri, cong an la jianglin yiqian, nimen yingdang daying nimen de zhu. Zai na ri nimen jue meiyou taobi di difang, ye jue buneng dilai

Ruguo tamen tuibi, name, wo meiyou pai ni zuo tamen de jianhu zhe, ni zhi fu tongzhi de zeren. Wo shi renlei changshi cong wo fachu de enhui de shihou, tamen yin enhui er kuaile; tamen yinwei cengjing fanzui er zaonan de shihou, renlei que shi gu en de
Tiandi de zhuquan, gui an la suoyou. Ta yu chuangzao shenme, jiu chuangzao shenme; yu gei shei nuhai, jiu gei shei nuhai; yu gei shei nanhai, jiu gei shei nanhai
huo shi tamen jian sheng nanhai he nuhai; ta shi tasuo yiyu zhe chengwei buneng shengyu de. Ta que shi quanzhi de, que shi quanneng de
Renhe ren ye bupei yu an la duihua, chufei qishi, huo cong weimu de houmian, huo pai yige shizhe, feng ta de mingling er qishi tasuo yu qishi de. Ta que shi zhigaowushang de, que shi zhi rui de

Wo zheyang qishi ni cong wo de mingling zhong fachu de jingshen. Ni benlai bu zhidao tian jing shi shenme, zhengxin shi shenme; dan wo yi tian jing wei guangming, er jie ci guangming yindao wo suo yu yindao de puren. Ni que shi zhishi zhenglu zhe
Na shi an la de lu. Tiandi wanwu, dou shi ta de. Zhen de, wanshi zhi gui an la
Ha yi, mi mu
Yi mingbai de jingdian mengshi
wo que yi yi ci wei alabo wen de “gulanjing”, yibian nimen liaojie
Zai wo nali de tian jing yuanben zhong, ta que shi gaoshang de, que shi ruizhi de
Nandao yinwei nimen shi guofen de minzhong, wo jiu shi nimen bude shou jiaoxun ma
Wo ceng paiqian xuduo xianzhi qu jiaohua gudai de minzu
mei ge xianzhi lailin tamen de shihou, tamen dou jiayi yunong
Wo ceng huimiele bi ni de zongzu geng qiangheng zhe, xian min de shili yi shiqule
Ruguo ni wen tamen:“Shei chuangzaole tiandi?” Tamen biding shuo:“Wanneng de, quanzhi de zhu chuangzaole tiandi.”
Ta yi dadi wei nimen de anxi zhi suo, ta wei nimen zai da dishang kaipi xuduo daolu, yibian nimen dadao luxing de mudi de
Ta cong tianshang jiangxia you dingliang de yushui, jie yushui er shi yi si di difang fuhuo. Nimen jianglai yao zheyang cong fenmu zhong bei quchu
Ta chuangzao wan lei, er yi chuanbo he shengchu gong nimen qi cheng

yibian nimen duan zuo zai shangmian. Ranhou, zai duan zuo de shihou, xiangzhe nimen de zhu de endian, bingqie shuo:“Zansong an la, chaojue wanwu! Ta wei women zhifu ci wu, women duiyu ta ben shi wuneng
Women biding guiyu women de zhu.”
Tamen ba ta de yibufen puren, dang zuo tamen de fenzi; ren que shi mingxian de gu en zhe
Nandao ta cong ziji suo chuangzao de zhongsheng zhong zi qu nu'er, er yi nan'er zhuan gui nimen ma
Tamen wangyan zhiren zhu you nu'er, dan tamen zhong de yige ting shuo ziji de qi zi sheng nu'er de shihou, ta de lianse bian cheng andan de, erqie ta shi ao nu de
Zai shoushi zhong chang da, qie buneng xiongbian zhe,(nandao tamen yi ta gui an la ma)
Zhong tianshi ben shi an la de nupu, tamen que yi zhong tianshi wei nuxing. Tamen ceng jianzheng an la chuangzao tianshi ma? Tamen de jianzheng jiang bei jilu xialai, tamen ye jiang bei shenwen
Tamen shuo:“Jiaruo zhiren zhu yiyu, women shi bu hui chongbai tamen de.” Tamen duiyu ci shuo, hao wu renshi; tamen zhishi shuohuang hua
Nandao yiqian wo ceng ci tamen yi ben tian jing, er tamen shi jianchi na ben tian jing de
Buran, tamen shuo:“Women que yi faxian women de zuxian shi xinfeng yi zhong zongjiao de, women que shi zunxun tamen de yiji er de zhengdao de.”

Zai ni zhiqian, mei feng wo zheyang paiqian jinggao zhe dao yige chengshi qu, nali de haohua zhe zong shi shuo:“Women que yi faxian women de zuxian shi xinfeng yi zhong zongjiao de, women que shi zunxun tamen de yiji de.”

Ta shuo:“Jishi wo xianshi nimen yi zhong bi nimen zuxian de zongjiao geng wei chongzheng de zongjiao, nimen hai yao zuncong nimen de zuxian ma?” Tamen shuo:“Women que shi buxin nimen suo feng de shiming de.”
Guwo chengfale tamen, ni kan kan fouren zhengdao zhe de jieju shi zenyang de
Dangshi, yi bo la xin dui ta de fuqin he zongzu shuo:“Wo yu nimen suo chongbai de, que shi meiyou guanxi de
wei chuangzao wo de zhu ze buran, ta biding yindao wo.”
Ta jiang zhe ju hua liu zeng ta de houyi yibian tamen huiwu
Buran, wo shi zhexie ren he tamen de zuxian xiangshou, zhidao zhenli jianglin, ji xuanjiao de shizhe dansheng
Zhenli jianglin tamen de shihou, tamen shuo:“Zhe shi moshu, women biding buxin ta.”
Tamen shuo:"Zenme bu ba zhe ben “gulanjing” jiang shi liang chengzhong renhe yi cheng de yao ren ne?”

Nandao tamen neng fenpei ni de zhu de enhui ma? Wo jiang tamen zai jinshi shenghuo zhong de shengji fenpei ji tamen, wo shi tamen bici xiangcha ruogan ji, yibian tamen ceng ceng jiezhi. Ni de zhu de enhui bi tamen suo jixu de geng youmei
Ruo bushi wei fang shiren bian wei yi jiao, wo bi shi bu xin zhiren zhu de renmen de fangwu bian cheng you yin ding de, he yin ti de, yibian tamen denglin qi shang
bing jiang tamen de fangwu bian cheng you yin men he yin chuang de, yibian tamen yan wochuang shang
bing jiang tamen de fangwu bian cheng you jinshi de. Zhexie wufei shi jin shi shenghuo de xiangshou; zai ni de zhu nali de houshi, shi zhuan gui jingwei zhe de
Shei yaoshi wushi zhiren zhu de jiaohui, wo jiu rang yige emo fu zai shei de shenshang, chengwei ta de pengyou
Naxie emo, fang'ai tamen zunxun zhengdao, er tamen que yiwei ziji shi zunxun zhengdao de
Dai wushi zhe lai dao wo nali de shihou, ta dui ta de pengyou shuo:“Dan yuan wo he ni zhi jian, you dongxi liang fang de juli, ni zhe pengyou zhen elie!”
Nimen ceng xing bu yi, suoyi jinri zhe zhong yuanwang duiyu nimen jue wu biyi. Yinwei nimen yao tong shou xingfa
Nandao ni neng shi longzi tingwen, huo neng yindao xiazi he zai mingxian de mi wu zhong de ren ma
Ruguo wo shi ni qi shi, name, wo jianglai biding yao chengfa tamen
huo wo yao zhaoshi ni wo suoyong yi jinggao tamen de xingfa, name, wo dui tamen, que shi quanneng de
Suoyi ni yingdang jianchi ni suo shou de qishi, ni que shi zai zhengdao shang de
“Gulanjing” que shi ni he ni de zongzu de rongyu, nimen jianglai yao bei shenwen
Ni wen wen zai ni zhiqian suo paiqian de zhong shizhe, wo ceng fou zai zhiren zhu zhi wai zhiding xuduo shenling gong ren chongbai
Wo que yi paiqian mu sa daizhe wo de xuduo jixiang, qu jiaohua falao he ta de guizumen, ta shuo:“Wo que shi zhong shijie de zhu de shizhe.”
Dang ta ba wo de xuduo jixiang zhaoshi tamen de shihou, tamen like chaoxiao naxie jixiang
Wo suo zhaoshi tamen de jixiang, yi jian bi yi jian da. Wo ceng yi xingfa chengzhi tamen, yibian tamen huiwu
Tamen ceng shuo: Shushi a! Qing ni wei women qidao ni de zhu, yinwei ta ceng yu ni ding yue de yuangu, women biding yao zunxun zhengdao
Dang wo jiechu tamen suo zao de xingfa de shihou, tamen like shuangyue
Falao ceng hanjiao ta de baixing shuo:“Wo de baixing a! Misi er (aiji) de guo quan, he zai wo jiaoxia benliu de jianghe, bu dou shi wo de ma? Nandao nimen kan bujian
Nandao wo bushi bi zhe beijian erqie hanhu de ren geng qiang ma
Zenme meiyou huangjin de shouzhuo, jia zai ta de shou shang ne? Huozhe shi zhong tianshi tong ta jiezhong jianglin ne?”
Ta ceng gudong ta de baixing, tamen jiu fucong ta; tamen que shi beini zhe
Dang tamen chufan wo de shihou, wo chengzhi tamen, gu shi tamen tongtong yan si
wo yi tamen wei hou ren de jianjie
Dang mai er yan de erzi bei ju wei li de shihou, ni de zongzu like xuanhua
tamen shuo:“Women de zhong shenling geng hao ne? Haishi ta geng hao ne?” Tamen zhishi wei qiangciduoli er ju ta wei li, buran, tamen shi hao bian de minzhong
Ta zhishi yige puren, wo ci ta de endian, bing yi ta wei yiselie houyi de shifan
Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo bi she nimen er chuangzao xuduo tianshi, zai da dishang jicheng nimen
Zhe que shi fuhuo shi de yuzhao, ni qie mo huaiyi ta, ni yingdang shuncong wo, zhe shi zhenglu
Jue buyao rang emo fang'ai nimen, ta que shi nimen de ming di

Dang er sa daizhe xuduo mingzheng lailin de shihou, ta shuo:“Wo que yi ba zhihui dai lai gei nimen, yibian wo wei nimen jieshi nimen suo zhenglun de yibufen lu li. Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo
An la que shi wo de zhu, yeshi nimen de zhu, suoyi nimen yingdang chongbai ta, zhe shi zhenglu
Ge jiaopai de ren, bici fenzheng. Ai zai bu yi de renmen! Jianglai yao shou tongku ri de xingfa
Tamen zhi qiwangzhe fuhuo shi buzhi bu jue de huran lailin tamen
Zai na ri, yiban pengyou jiang huxiang choushi, wei jingwei zhe ze buran
Wo de zhong pu a! Jinri nimen meiyou kongju, ye meiyou youchou
Tamen ceng gui xin wo de jixiang, tamen yuan shi shunfu de
Nimen he nimen de qizi, yukuai di jin leyuan qu ba
Jiang you jin pan he jinbei, zai tamen zhi jian ai ci chuandi. Leyuan zhong youxin suo lianmu, yan suo xinshang de lequ, nimen jiang yong ju qizhong
Zhe shi nimen yin ziji de shanxing er de jicheng de leyuan
Nimen zai qizhong, jiang you xuduo shuiguo, gong nimen qu shi
Zui renmen jianglai bi yong ju huo yu de xingfa zhong
na xingfa bu shao jianqing, tamen jiang zai qizhong jusang
Wo meiyou kuidai tamen, dan tamen zi qi
Tamen jiang hanjiao shuo:“Malike a! Qing ni de zhu chujue women ba! Ta shuo:“Nimen biding yao liu zai xingfa zhong.”
Wo que yi ba zhenli zhaoshi nimen, dan nimen daban shiyanwu zhenli de
Tamen yi jueding yi jian shile ma? Wo ye bi jueding yi jian shi
Tamen yiwei wo ting bujian tamen de mimi he si yi ma? Buran, wo de tianshimen jiu zai tamen de genqian, jilu tamen de yanxing
Ni shuo:“Ruguo zhiren zhu you nu'er, name, wo shi shouxian chongbai qi nu'er de.”
Zansong tiandi de zhu, baozuo de zhu, ta shi chao hu tamen de xushu de
Ni rang tamen wang tan ba! Rang tamen xixi ba! Zhidao tamen kan dao tamen bei jinggao de rizi
Ta zai tianshang shi ying shou chongbai de, zai dishang yeshi ying shou chongbai de; ta que shi zhi rui de, que shi quanzhi de
Duo fu zai, you tiandi de guo quan he tiandi jian de wanwu zhe! Fuhuo shi de zhishi zhiyou ta zhidao, nimen zhi bei zhao guiyu ta
Tamen she ta er qidao de, meiyou ti ren shuo qing de quanbing; wei yi zhenli er zuozheng, qie shen zhi qi zheng ci de renmen, ze buran
Ruguo ni wen tamen, shei chuangzao tamen, tamen biding shuo:“An la.” Tamen shi ruhe beimiu ne
Ta shuo: Wo de zhu a! Zhexie ren que shi bu xindao de minzhong
Ni yingdang yuanliang tamen, ni yingdang shuo:“Zhu nimen ping'an! Tamen bujiu jiu zhidaole.”
Ha yi, mi mu
Yi mingque de jingdian mengshi
zai yige jixiang de yejian, wo que yi jiang shi ta, wo que shi jinggao zhe
Zai na yeli, yiqie ruizhi de shi, dou bei panding
na shi anzhao cong wo nali fachu de mingling de. Wo que shi paiqian shizhe de
Na shi youyu cong ni de zhu fachu de enhui. Ta que shi quan cong de, que shi quanzhi de
Ta shi tiandi wanwu de zhi zhu, ruguo nimen shi jianxin zhe.”
Chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Ta neng shi sizhe sheng, neng shi sheng zhe si, ta shi nimen de zhu, yeshi nimen zuxian de zhu
Buran, tamen shi zai yihuo zhong de, shi youxi de
Ni yingdang dengdai yanwu mantian de rizi
na yanwu jiang longzhao shiren, tamen shuo:“Zhe shi yi zhong tongku de xingfa.”
Women de zhu a! Qiu ni wei women jiechu zhe zhong xingfa, women que shi xindao de
Tamen zen neng juewu ne? Xianhe de shizhe, que yi lailin tamen
er tamen que biqi ta. Tamen shuo: Ta shi shou jiao de, shi fengkuang de
Wo biding yao zhanshi jiechu zhe zhong xingfa, nimen biding fu fan yu beini
Wo jinxing zuida de xiji zhi ri, wo biding yao chengfa tamen
Zai tamen zhiqian, wo que yi kaoyanle falao de baixing. You yige gaogui de shizhe lailin tamen
shuo:“Nimen ba an la de pu renmen jiao gei wo ba! Wo que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe, fengming lai jiaohua nimen de
Nimen buyao dui an la gao'ao. Wo biding yao zhaoshi nimen yige mingzheng
Wo que yi qiu bi yu wo de zhu he nimen de zhu, mian zao nimen de mouhai
Ruguo nimen bu xiangxin wo, name, nimen fangren wo ba!”
Ta jiu qidao ta de zhu shuo: Zhe deng ren, que shi fanzui de minzhong.”
(Zhu shuo): Ni daizhe wo de zhong pu zai yejian chuzou ba! Nimen biding yao bei zhuigan
Ni rang haishui baochi pingjing, tamen biding shi bei yan si de jundui.”
Tamen ceng pao xia ruogan yuanpu he quanyuan
zhuangjia hemei zhai
yiji tamen suo xiangshou de fu ze
Jieju shi zheyang de: Wo ceng shi bie de minzhong jicheng tamen
tiandi meiyou ku tamen, tamen ye meiyou huode huanxing
Wo que yi shi yiselie de houyi baituole lingru de xingfa
falao de xingfa. Ta que shi gao'ao de, que shi guofen de
Wo que yi ben zhenzhi er xuanba tamen, shi tamen chao yi ge minzu
wo shangci tamen xuduo jixiang, dou shi you mingxian de shi yan de
Zhe deng ren biding yao shuo
“Women zhiyou chuci de siwang, women bu hui fuhuo
Nimen ba women de zuxian zhaohuan huilai ba, ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de
Tamen shi geng gaogui de ne? Haishi tu bai de zongzu shi geng gaogui ne? Zai tamen zhiqian de xuduo minzu, wo yi jiayi huimiele; yinwei tamen que shi fanzui zhe
Wo meiyou yi youxi de taidu chuangzao tiandi wanwu
wo zhi ben zhenli er chuangzao zhi, dan tamen daban bu zhidao
Zhenbie ri, que shi wei tamen quanti yuding de riqi
Zai na ri, pengyou duiyu pengyou, hao wu biyi, tamen ye bu meng yuanzhu
wei an la suo lianxu zhe ze buran. Ta que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Zan hu mu de guoshi
que shi zuiren de shipin
xiang you jiao yang zai tamen de fu zhong feiteng
xiang kaishui yiyang de feiteng
(Zhu shuo):“Nimen zhuo zhu ta, ranhou, ba ta tuo ru huo yu zhong
ranhou, zai ba feishui de xingfa qingzhu zai ta de tou shang! ”
Ni changshi ba! Ni que shi xianhe de, que shi zungui de
Zhe (xingfa) que shi nimen shengqian suo huaiyi de.”
Jingwei zhe biding yao zhu zai anquan di difang
zhe li you yuanpu he yuanquan
chuanzhuo ling luo chouduan, xiangxiang er zuo
Jieju shi zheyang de: Wo jiang yi baixi de, mei mudi nuzi, zuo tamen de banlu
Tamen zai leyuan zhong, jiang anquan de suoqu ge zhong shuiguo
Tamen zai leyuan zhong, chu chuci siwang wai bu zai chang si de ziwei. An la jiang shi tamen de mian yu huo yu de xingfa
Na shi youyu ni de zhu de endian, na que shi weida de chenggong
Wo yi ni de yuyan, shi “gulanjing” chengwei yi jie de, zhi wei xiwang tamen neng juewu
Ni dengzhe ba, tamen que shi dengdaizhuo de
Ha yi, mi mu
Zhe ben jing shi cong zhiren zhi rui de an la jiang shi de
Tianshang dishang, zai xindao zhe kan lai que you xuduo jixiang
An la chuangzao nimen, bing sanbu ge zhong dongwu, zai jianxin zhe kan lai, qizhong you xuduo jixiang
Zhouye de lunliu, an la cong yun zhong jiangxia jiyang, jiu jie ta er shi yi si de dadi fuhuo, yiji gaibian fengxiang; zai neng liaojie de ren kan lai, qizhong you xuduo jixiang
Zhexie shi an la de jixiang, wo ben zhenli er dui ni xushu ta. Zai an la de xun ci he jixiang zhihou, tamen hai yao xin shenme xun ci ne
Ai zai mei ge wangyan de duo zui zhe
Ta tingjian bieren dui ta xuandu an la de jixiang shi, bian zi da er guzhi, haoxiang meiyou tingjian shi de, suoyi ni yingdang yi tongku de xingfa xiang ta baoxi
Dang ta zhidao wo de yidian jixiang de shihou, jiu ba ta dang zuo xiaobing. Zhe deng ren jiang shou lingru de xingfa
Tamen de shenhou you huo yu, tamen suo huode de, duiyu tamen, hao wu biyi; tamen she an la er renwei baohu shen de, duiyu tamen, ye hao wu biyi; tamen jiang shou tongku de xingfa
Zhe shi zhengdao, buxin qi zhu de jixiang zhe jiang shou tongku de jixing
An la wei nimen er zhifu haiyang, yibian chuanbo feng ta de mingling er hangxing, yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui, yibian nimen ganxie
Ta wei nimen er zhifu tiandi wanwu, duiyu neng siwei de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang
Ni dui xindao zhemen shuo, yao she you naxie bu xiwang jian dao an la de renmen, yibian an la yin tamen de xingwei lai fu chou tamen
Xingshan zhe zi shou qi yi, zuo'e zhe zi shou qi hai. Ranhou, nimen yao bei zhao guiyu nimen de zhu
Wo que yi ba tian jing, zhihui, yuyan, shangci yiselie de houyi, bing yi jiamei de shipin gongji tamen, qie shi tamen chao yi ge minzu
Wo ceng zhaoshi tamen guanyu ci shi de xuduo mingzheng, tamen zai zhishi jianglin tamen zhihou, cai yin huxiang jidu er zhenglun. Fuhuo ri, ni de zhu biding panjue tamen suo zhenglun de shifei
Ranhou, wo shi ni zunxun guanyu ci shi de jiao fa. Ni yingdang zunshou na changdao, buyao shuncong wu zhi zhe de siyu
Tamen biding buneng wei ni diyu an la de xingfa yi sihao. Bu yi zhe biding huxiang jianhu; an la shi jianhu jingwei zhe de
Zhe shi shiren de mingzheng, yeshi dui jianxin de minzhong de yindao he enhui
Nandao zuo'e zhe yiwei wo hui shi tamen he xindao erqie xingshan zhe yiyang, er shi tamen de shengsi xiangdeng ma? Tamen de panduan zhen elie
An la ben zhenli er chuangzao tiandi, yibian mei geren dou yin qi xingwei er shou baochou, tamen jianglai bu shou kui wang

Ni gaosu wo ba! Yi siyu wei zhuzai de ren, an la shi ta mingzhi gu wei de mi wu, bing fengbi ta de er he xin, zai ta de yan shang jia yi mo; an la shi ta mi wu zhihou, shei hai neng yindao ta ne? Nandao nimen bu juewu ma
Tamen shuo:“Zhiyou women de jinshi shenghuo, women si de si, sheng de sheng, zhiyou guangyin neng shi women xiaomie. Tamen duiyu na shi, yi wu suo zhi, tamen zhuan shi caice
Youren dui tamen xuandu wo de mingxian de jixiang de shihou, tamen zhishi jiekou shuo:“Nimen ba women de zuxian zhaohuan huilai ba, ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de. ”
Ni shuo: An la shi nimen sheng, ranhou shi nimen si, ranhou zai hao wuyi yi de fuhuo ri jihe nimen; dan shiren daban bu zhidao. ”
Tiandi de guo quan, gui an la suoyou. Fuhuo shi lailin zhi ri, fandui zhenli zhe jiang shou kui she
Ni jianglai hui kanjian, mei yi minzu dou shi quxi de, mei yi minzu dou yao bei zhao qu kan ziji de gongguo bu. Jinri, nimen jiang shou ziji xingwei de baochou.”
Zhe shi wo li de gongguo bu, ta dui nimen binggong zuozheng. Wo que yi xialing jilu nimen de xingwei
Zhiyu xindao erqie xingshan zhe, tamen de zhuyao shi tamen ru yu ta de enhui zhong, na que shi mingxian de chenggong
Zhiyu buxindao zhe,(wo shuo):“Nandao meiyouren dui nimen xuanduguo wo de jixiang ma? Dan nimen zi da, nimen yuan shi fanzui de minzhong.”

Youren shuo:“An la de yingxu, que shi zhenshi de; fuhuo shi shi hao wuyi yi de.” Nimen jiu shuo:“Women bu zhidao fuhuo shi shi shenme, women zhi caixiang na huoxu shi yao fasheng de, dan women bing bu quexin.”
Tamen suozuo de zui'e, jianglai yao dui tamen xianxian; tamen suo chaoxiao de xingfa, jianglai yao lailin tamen
Huozhe jiang dui tamen shuo:“Jinri wo hushi nimen, ru nimen yiqian hushi jinri de xiang hui yiyang. Nimen de guisu shi huo yu, nimen jue meiyou yuanzhu zhe
Na shi youyu nimen ba an la de jixiang dang zuo xiaobing, chenshi de shenghuo qipianle nimen de yuangu.” Jinri tamen bu bei fangchu huo yu, ye bude yao en
Yiqie zansong, zhi gui an la——zhu tian de zhu, dadi de zhu, zhong shijie de zhu
Tiandi jian de weida, zhi shuyu ta; ta shi wanneng de, shi zhi rui de
Ha yi, mi mu
Zhe ben jing shi cong zhiren zhi rui de an la jiang shi de
Wo zhi ben zhenli er chuangzao tiandi wanwu, wo zhi shi tamen cunzai zhi yi dingqi. Bu xindao de renmen bugu tamen ceng shou jinggao de xingfa

ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen she an la er qidao di naxie ouxiang zenme ying shou chongbai ne? Nimen gaosu wo ba! Tamen ceng duzi chuangzaole dadi de na yibufen ne? Haishi tamen ceng yu an la gongtong chuangzao zhu tian ne? Nimen zhaoshi wo ci jing zhiqian de yi ben tian jing, huo cancun de gu xue ba, ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de.”
Tamen she an la er qidao naxie dao fuhuo ri ye bu hui yingda tamen, erqie hushi tamen de qidao de ouxiang, you shei bi tamen geng mi wu ne
Dang zhongren bei jihe de shihou, naxie bei chongbai de, yao bian cheng naxie chongbai zhe de choudi, bingqie fouren ziji ceng shouguo tamen de chongbai
Youren dui tamen songdu wo de mingxian de jixiang de shihou, bu xindao de renmen pinglun gang jianglin tamen de zhenli shuo:“Zhe shi mingxian de moshu.”

Tamen shenzhi shuo:“Ta weizao “gulanjing””. Ni shuo:“Ruguo wo weizao “gulanjing”, name, nimen buneng wei wo diyu an la de yidian xingfa. Ta quanzhi nimen dui “gulanjing” de feibang, ta zu wei wo he nimen zhi jian de jianzheng. Ta que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de.”
Ni shuo:“Wo bushi potianhuang de shizhe; wo bu zhidao wo yao zaoyu shenme, ye bu zhidao nimen yao zaoyu shenme, wo zhi zuncong wo suo shou de qishi, wo zhishi yige tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”

Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Ruguo “gulanjing” shi cong an la nali jiang shi de, er nimen bu xin ta,——yiselie houyi de yige jianzheng, yi zuozheng qi xiangsi er xinfeng zhi, nimen que buxie xinfeng——〔name, shei bi nimen geng mi wu ne?〕 An la biding bu yindao bu yi de minzhong.”

Bu xindao de renmen pinglun xindao de renmen shuo:“Jiaruo na shi yi jian shanshi, tamen bude zai women zhiqian xinfeng ta.” Tamen meiyou yin “gulanjing” er zunxun zhengdao,〔gu tamen de pianzhi yi xianzhule〕. Tamen yao shuo:“Zhe shi chenfu de wangyan.”

Zai ta zhiqian, you mu sa de jingdian zuo shiren de zhunsheng he enhui. Zhe shi yi ben alabo wen de jingdian, neng zhengshi yiqian de tian jing, yibian ta jinggao bu yi de renmen, bing zuo xingshan zhe de jiayin
Naxie shuoguo:“Women de zhu shi an la,” ranhou zunxun zhengdao de renmen, jianglai meiyou kongju, ye bu youchou
zhe deng ren, shi leyuan de jumin, jiang yong ju qizhong; zhe shi weile baochou tamen de xingwei

Wo ceng ming ren xiaojing fumu; ta de muqin, xinku de huaizhe ta, xinku di sheng ta, zai ta shoutai he duan ru de shiqi, gongji shi sanshi ge yue. Dang ta dadao zhuangnian, zai dadao sishi sui de shihou, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni qishi wo, shi wo ganxie ni suo shi yu wo he wo de fumu de enhui, bingxing ni suo xiyue de shanshi. Qiu ni wei wo gaishan wo de houyi. Wo que yi xiang ni huizui, wo que shi yige shunfu zhe.”
Zhe deng ren, wo jieshou tamen de shangong, wo she you tamen de zui'e, tamen jiang chengwei leyuan de jumin. Zhe shi tamen suo shou de zhenshi de yingxu

You ren dui ta de fumu shuo “ai! Ni lia donghe wo shuo: Wo yao fuhuo ma? Zai wo zhiqian, you xuduo shidai, que yi shiqule.” Ta lia xiang an la qiuyuan, bingqie shuo:“Shang zai ni! Ni xindao ba, an la de yingxu, que shi zhenshi de!” Ta shuo:“Zhe zhishi guren de gushi.”
Zhe deng ren, yingdang shou xingfa de panjue, er ru yu yiqian shiqu de jingling he renlei de ge minzu zhi zhong; tamen que shi kui she de
Tamen jiang yin ziji de xingwei er ge you ruogan dengji, yibian an la dui tamen de xingwei jiyu wanquan de baochou, tamen bu shou kui wang

Bu xindao de renmen zaoshou huoxing zhi ri, huozhe jiang dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zai chenshi shenghuo zhong, yi jiang nimen de fu fen xiao jin xiang wan; jinri nimen ying shou lingru de xingfa, yinwei nimen ceng zai difang shang wangzizunda, ye yinwei nimen cengjing fanzui.”

Ni jinian a de ren de dixiong ba! Dangshi, ta zai shaqiu jinggao ta de zongzu——zai ta yiqian he yihou, you xuduo jinggao zhe que yi shiqule——ta shuo:“Nimen yinggai zhi chongbai an la, wo dique pa nimen zaoshou zhongda ri de xingfa.”
Tamen shuo:“Ni lai zuzhi women chongbai women de zhong shenling ma? Ni zhaoshi women ni suoyong yi donghe women de xingfa ba! Ruguo ni shi shuo shihua de!”
Ta shuo:“Zhiyou an la zhidao xingfa he shi jianglin nimen, wo zhi neng ba wo de shiming chuanda gei nimen, dan wo yiwei nimen shi wuzhi de minzhong.”

Tamen kanjian tianbian you yi duo baiyun, xiangzhe tamen de shangu yidong, tamen shuo:“Zhe duo yun hui jiangyu gei women.” Buran, zhe shi nimen zaori yaoqiu shixian de, zhe shi kuangfeng, qizhong you tongku de xingfa
Ta feng ta de zhu de mingling er huimie yiqie. Yidan zhi jian, bujian tamen, zhi jian tamen de fangwu. Wo yao ruci baochou fanzui de minzhong

Wo que yi ba meiyou shangci nimen di diwei shangcile tamen, wo ceng fuyu tamen congming ruizhi; dan tamen de congming ruizhi, duiyu tamen hao wu biyi, yinwei tamen fouren an la de jixiang, suoyi tamen yixiang chaoxiao de xingfa jianglinliao tamen
Wo que yi huimie nimen silin de chengshi. Wo fanfu zhaoshi ge zhong jixiang, yibian tamen huiwu
Tamen she an la er feng wei shenling, yi qiu qinjin an la de ouxiang, zenme bu xiangzhu tamen ne! Buran, tamen yi huibi tamenle. Na shi tamen de wangyan, yeshi tamen weizao de

Dangshi, wo ceng shi yi huo jingling, zou dao ni mianqian, lai jing ting “gulanjing”. Dang tamen lai daole ta mianqian de shihou, tamen shuo:“Dajia jing ting ba!” Songdu wanbi, tamen jiu huiqu jinggao tamen de zongzu
tamen shuo:“Women de zongzu a! Women que yi tingjian yi ben zai mu sa zhihou jiang shi de jingdian, ta neng zhengshi yiqian de tian jing, neng zhiyin zhenli he zhenglu
Women de zongzu a! Nimen dang yingda an la de haozhao zhe, er gui xin'an la, an la jiang she you nimen de yibufen zuiguo, bing shi nimen de mian yu tongku de xingfa
Bu yingda an la haozhao zhe de ren, zai da dishang jue buneng taobi tianqian, chu an la wai, tamen jue wu baohu zhe, zhe deng ren shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong de.”
Chuangzao tiandi er bu ganjue pifa de an la, shi neng shi sizhe fuhuo de. Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Shi de, ta duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de

Bu xindao de renmen zaoshou huoxing zhi ri, huozhe jiang dui tamen shuo:“Nandao zhe xingfa bushi zhenshi de ma?” Tamen jiang shuo:“Shi zhenshi de, yi women de zhu mengshi!” Ta jiang shuo:“Nimen changshi xingfa ba! Yinwei nimen meiyou xindao.”
